Coinega tolohalao mabwaiyadi ma wete taudi hi'ahi'a 'i'abi hebuwediya mabwaiyadi Yesu 'i'abihe bwebwe'anediya. Ma hi'ahi'a 'i'ausidiya, 'igwae, “Geya'abwa wahehepwailegau,” weyahina Yesu sisanapuya.
Ci'iuna ma gona 'i'adale, Yesu 'itoholowa ma hadega 'ilatuwa, 'iboi 'inaowa yoho 'awawa, 'i'ahwanoiya Tamana 'oina.
Saimoni ma 'iyanao wete silatuwa ma Yesu si'ebeseya,
ta silobeya, ma sihegwaeya, “Tomota mabwaiyadi nuwanuwadi 'owa.”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Tatau 'asa tupwadi wete 'oidiya, yaguguya. Bewa weyahina yanaoma.”
Coinega Galili mabwaiyana 'isakowasiyeya ma 'idi hada tapwalolo 'oidiya 'iguguya, ma wete hi'ahi'a tomota 'oidiyega 'iula latuhediya.
Ma tolepelo 'aigeda Yesu 'oina 'inaoma 'i'etuluha, ma 'i'ahwanoiyeya, 'igwae, “Ceguma 'owa 'ino nuwatuhu gide, sowasowahina ma 'u'abihe bwebwe'anegau.”
Coinega Yesu 'i'ate muyemuyeya, ma nimanega loheyaina 'wapina 'i'abi tohoya, ma 'igwae, “Cehe gidemusa.”
Ta loheyaina 'wapina 'ibwebwe'ana mwayamwayauwa.

Ma Yesu loheyaina 'iloina hepa'aleya, ma 'igwae, “Cutauya, ma gesowana taiya 'eta 'oina 'uhehepwailegau, ma hesi 'udumwalu topwaoli 'oina 'i'itago, ma 'ino pwaoli 'u'ebwaya Yehoba 'oina, to'aha gide 'ada loina Mosese 'oinega. Eema tomota sisanapugo 'abehega 'owa 'ubwebwe'ana pwaiya.”

Ma loheyaina geya Yesu 'ina loina 'ihematamatane, ma hesi tomota 'oidiya 'ihepwaila dadaneya. Eeta Yesu geya sowasowahina ma 'iyawala 'asaedi 'alodiya, ta 'oinega 'inaowa yoho 'awawa ma nobwa 'imiyamiya, ma tomota tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiyega sinaoma 'oina.
Sabwelo tupwana sigumwala ma Yesu 'ihila Kapaneumi 'oina, ma wasana sihesagoheya 'abehega Yesu 'ihila pwaima.
Ma boda madouna hada 'alona ma wete 'ahwa'edaina 'atamanina si'eto'auta, ma Yesu 'iguguya 'oidiya.
Ma boda topeu 'aigeda ma hewaina si'eweyama ma 'ana to'ahalaedi sitehata si'ahaliyama.

Ma sitohoya ma topeuina siluhuwe Yesu 'oina, ma geya sowasowahidi, weyahina boda 'imadou hedada, eeta si'ahala haneheya hada tabwana, ma 'ana 'atoha sibwaleya, 'igumwala eeta topeuina ma hewaina sihedawedaweya, Yesu matana silaguya.
Coinega Yesu loheloheyaedi 'idi hemisa 'isanapuya ma topeuina 'ihegwaeya, “Natugu, 'ino puiyao mabwaiyana yanuwasamudiya.”

Ma tupwana loina 'ana tohe'itao deina simiyamiya Yesu 'ina gwae sihesagoheya ma siboi 'atediya sinuwanuwatuhu, sigwae, “Loheya bewa 'igwae bwagabwaga ma Yehoba 'isinaliya. Geya 'eta taiya sowasowahina ma tomota 'idi puiyao 'inuwasamudi, beno tuwa Yehoba sowasowahina.”
Ma hesi Yesu 'atena 'idi nuwatuhu 'isanapuya, 'oinega 'ihegwaediya, “To'aha weyahina beno gide wanuwanuwatuhu 'esa?
Ma wanuwatuhuya 'abehega to gwae sowasowahina ma topeu bewa 'oina yagwaene, sowasowana yagwae, ‘Cino puiyao yanuwasamudiya,’ bo sowasowana yagwae, ‘Cutoholo ma 'ino 'ebe'eno 'u'ahali ma 'utau.’
Bewa 'oina wasanapugau 'abehega taugu Loheyaiguina ma'igu loina ma bale'uwa tomota 'idi puiyao yanuwasamudi.”
Coinega topeuina 'ihegwaeya, “Taugu bewa yahegwaego ‘Cutoholo 'ino 'ebe'eno 'u'ahali ma 'utauya 'ino 'asa.’”
Ma 'itoholowa, 'ina 'ebe'eno 'i'ahaliya, ma boda matadiya 'ilatuwa. Nage 'oina boda mabwaiyadi nuwadi 'ipwanopwanowa, ma Yehobaina sihehepwatuwe, sigwaeya, “Paihowa bewa ma'aigeda tuwa ta'iteya.”
Eema Yesu 'ihila hola Galili 'oina, ma wete boda si'autama, 'ihe'ita 'oidiya.

Cihe'ita 'igumwala ma 'inaonao. Ma loheya 'aigeda takesi 'ana to'ewa 'i'iteya 'ina hada 'ebe paihowa 'oina 'imiyamiya. Loheyaina Libai, ma tamana Alipiyo. Ma Yesu 'ihegwaeya, “Libai 'umuliyegau.” Coinega Libaiina 'itoholowa ma Yesu 'imuliyeya.

Muliyetega Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sinaoma Libai 'ina hada sabi 'ai, ma boda Yesu simuliyeya, taudi tolopui gide takesi 'ana to'ewao ma tolopui tupwadi wete, Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao ba'idadiyao simiyatoiya.

Simiyamiya ta Palisi 'idi loina 'ana tohe'itao si'itediya, eeta Yesu 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'oidiya sihesilala, sigwae, “To'aha weyahina 'imi tohe'ita takesi 'ana to'ewaowedi ma tolopuiyedi wete ba'idanao si'ai'ai hegogona?”

Ma Yesu Palisiyao 'idi gwae 'ihesagoheya, ta 'ihegwaediya, “Taudi wahidi waiwaidi genuwadi to'abihe bwebwe'ana, ma tolohalao hesi. Taugu yanaoma geya 'abehega tobwebwe'adi weyahidi, ma hesi topui ya'abihetedi.”

Yoni 'ana tomuliyao ma wete Palisiyao sihudiya 'idi tapwalolo weyahina, 'oinega tupwadi loheloheya Yesu 'oina sinaoma ma sihesilala, sigwaeya, “Yoni 'ana tomuliyao ma wete Palisiyao 'adi tomuliyao sihudihudi, ma togidega 'a tomuliyaowedi geya sihudi?”

Coinega Yesu gwae hegehegediyega 'ihegwaediya, “Togidega, 'ilobwaineya ma hai 'ana toyo'owao sinuwagala ma sihudi 'eguma tohai meloheyana ba'idadiu simiyamiya? Geya wete. Ceguma tauna ba'idanao mabwaiyadi siyaliyaya.
Ma wanuwatuhuyahi 'eguma sauga 'inaonaoma tohaiina 'i'ebesinedi ee 'abwa sihudi, ma'idi nuwagala.”
Ma 'aigeda wete gwae hegehegedi 'i'ebwaediya, 'igwae, “Geya sowasowahina ma 'ale'o 'ehauna tupwatupwana 'oinega ma 'wama miyamiyana tabwabwada, tabu ma taitaigalanaina 'i'eigala hila ma 'ihemadou.

Ma wete geya 'eta taiya we'aha waiwaina ma 'ehauna 'isiwa 'wapi 'ebesiwa miyamiyaidi 'oidiya, tabu ma silotaigala ma we'ahina wete 'itasiwa ma 'ihepaipaisiye, ma hesi 'eguma tasiwa 'wapi 'ebesiwa hauhaudimo 'oidiya.”
Sabati 'aigeda Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao tanoha 'alonega sitautau ma tomuliyaowedi 'idi tauya 'oina witi huwaina si'abilolodiya ma si'ai'ai.
Ma Palisiyao si'itediya ta Yesu sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Bada, togidega ta 'a tomuliyaowedi Sabati 'ana loina siligehiya?”
Eeta Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Buki He'asisi 'ana lele Debida weyahina 'eguma wahasili, wasanapu beno tauna ma'iyanao sigomaleya madouna.

Coinega Yehoba 'ina hada Debidaina 'iluhu ta beledi he'ahe'asisina 'i'eweya ma si'aiya. Belediina ma 'ana loina 'abehega topwaolimo 'adi tagwala ma si'ai. Ma tuwa sigomaleya, 'oinega topwaoli madouna, sanina Ebaya, 'itagwala ta si'aiya.”
Wete Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Yehoba Sabati 'i'ebwaegita 'ida bwebwe'ana weyahina, geya 'abehega 'ihemasalahegita Sabati weyahina.
Ma hesi Sabati 'ana toloinaina taugu Loheyaiguina tuwa.”
Muliyetega Yesu 'ihilama hada tapwalolowa. Nage 'oina 'aigeda loheya nima meyomeyona 'ilobeya 'imiyamiya.
Ma Palisiyao Yesu si'e'ebubu, ma 'eguma loheya 'i'abihe bwebwe'ane Sabatiya nata sihe'ewa.
Coinega Yesu loheyaina 'ihegwaeya, “Cutoholo 'ulagama,” ma loheyaina 'itoholowa ta 'ilaga.
Cilagama. Yesu babadaedi 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Bewa 'igu hesilala 'oimiya: To nuwatuhu bwebwe'ana 'oida? Sabati 'oina tomota talemedi, bo talohe'amasidi?”
Ma Yesu 'i'ebubu yahiyahidiya ma'ina gamwasowala ma wete ma'ina nuwagala 'idi debapa'ala weyahina, ma loheyaina 'ihegwaeya, “Nimau 'uyasi,” ma nimanaina 'iyasi hedumwaluya ma 'ibwebwe'ana.
Coinega Palisiyao ma'idi gamwasowala silatuwa, ma Helodi 'ina boda mahetediyao siloiloina togidega Yesu silohe'amasi 'ese.
Yesu 'i'ebesinediya ma'ana tomuliyaowedi sidobiya Galili holai, ma boda madouna simuliyeyama.
Bodaedi bewa Yesu 'ina paihowao wasana sihesagoheya, ta Galiliyega ma Yudiyaega ma Yelusalemega ma Idumea tupwanega ma Yolidani hali tupwega ma wete 'asaedi Taiya ma Saidoni deidiyega si'eto'autama.

Weyahina Yesu tolohalao 'i'abihe bwebwe'anediya, eeta tolohalaowedi baibaiwadi siheheduidui, nuwanuwadi si'abitoho, 'oinega Yesu 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'ihegwaediya, “Waga weyahigu wa'eweyama, ma 'eguma tomotaedi siheheduidui hedada, yagelu wagai.”
Ma taiyawedi tomota hi'ahi'a 'oidiya siluhuwa, ma 'eguma Yesuina si'ita sibe'u ma si'eno talutalubu'i matana ma sibwaubwau, sigwae, “Cowa Yehoba Natuna.”
Ma Yesu 'iloina pa'alediya, 'igwae, “Sahena wabwaubwau ma wahehepwailegau 'abehega Taugu Yehoba Natuna.”
Muliyetega 'oyai 'ihaneya, ma tupwadi 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'ihesinuwediya ma 'ibwauwediya, sihanema 'oina.

Ma 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Comi wate tuwelo yahesinuwegomiya ma 'omi ba'idagwao tamiyamiya, ma muliyetega yahewasaegomi 'asa tupwadi 'oidiya, ma waguguya ma waiwai 'oinega hi'ahi'a tomota 'oidiya waulalatuhedi.”
Ma sanidi bewa: Saimoni, tauna 'ibwauweya Pita.
Ma wete Yemesa ma tasina Yoni, taudi Sebedi natunao, ma Yesu 'ibwauwediya Bowanage (ma Bowanage 'ana nuwasabwalena 'abehega taudi tutu gide).

Ma wete Andulu ma Pilipi ma Batolomiu ma Madiu ma Tomasi, ma Yemesa 'ina waliyesa, tauna Alipiyo natuna, ma Tadiyasi ma Saimoni 'ina waliyesa, tauna to'ala'ohe'ohe madouna Isileli 'ina miyawasi Loma weyahina.
Ma wete Yudasa Isakaliyota, tauna 'abwa Yesu 'itebae.
Yesu 'ihila 'asai, ma boda madouna si'autama, ma geya sowasowahina Yesu ma'ana tomuliyaowedi si'aiyawasi eema si'ai.
Ma 'ina susuwao sihesagoheya 'abehega Yesu geya 'ida 'aiyawasiya, 'oinega sinaowa 'abehega sitoeyama, sigwaegwae, “Ciheyauyaule pwaiya.”

Ma loina 'ana tohe'itao tupwadi Yelusalemega sidobima, ma Yesu 'ina paihowa madouna si'iteya, ma sigwae, “Loheya bewa 'ihetopaihowa weyahina welabana 'idi bada beno Tomudulele 'ilemeleme, ma tauna 'ina waiwaiyega welabanao 'ipa'ipa'idi.”
Coinega Yesu loheloheyaowedi 'ibwauwedima ma gwae hegehegediyega 'ihe'ita 'oidiya, 'igwae, “To'aha weyahina Tomudulele 'abehega tauna 'iyanao 'ipa'idi?”
Ma wete 'igwaeya, “Ceguma 'aigeda 'ebeloina 'oina loheloheya siwatahidi ma siboi silo'aleha hiladi, 'abwa 'ebeloinaina 'iwe'a ma 'ibe'u.
Wete 'eguma susu 'aigeda ma siwatahi ma siboi silo'aleha hiladi, 'idi miya 'igala.
Tomudulele wete gide, 'eguma ma'iyanao siboi silolo'aleha hiladi, 'abwa 'ina 'ebeloinaina 'ibe'u, ma 'igumwala hataya.

“Cebe'ita 'aigeda wete loheya waiwaina, beno Tomudulele 'ina hada: Geya sowasowahina 'aigeda taiya 'iluhu tohewaiwaiina 'ina hada ma 'ina tobwatobwa 'i'ewadi, ma hesi 'eguma 'aigeda loheya gulaha 'oinega tohewaiwaiina nimana ma 'ahena 'ipai nugetedi, ee 'abwa 'iluhu 'ina hada, ma tobwatobwa 'i'ewadi.
“Coinega bewa yahegwae bwaibwainigomi 'abehega tomota 'idi puiyao ma 'idi gwae galagala mabwaiyana Yehoba 'ida nuwasamudi,
ma hesi 'aigeda tuwa geya, beno 'eguma taiya Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'i'ahwa galagalae, Yehoba nata geya 'inuwanuwasam, ma bewa mumuga galanaina 'oina 'imiya hataya.”
Bewa gide Yesu 'igwae 'esa weyahina sigwaegwae 'abehega tauna 'oina hi'ahi'a 'iluhuwa.
Eema Yesu sinana ma tasinao silatuwa ma 'atamana sitoholowa, ma gwaemo sihewasaeya Yesu 'oina ma 'abehega 'ihapwesa 'oidiya.
Ma tomotaedi Yesu deina simiyatoiya, ma sihegwaeya, “Bada, sinau ma tasimwao wa'ita latu 'atamana, nuwanuwadi 'owa.”
Yesu 'ihegwae hilediya, “Taiya sinagu? Ma taiyawedi tasigwao?”
Ma 'ana tomuliyaowedi deina simiyatoiya 'i'e'ebubudi, ma 'igwaeya, “Wa'ita bewa taudi sinagu ma tasigwao.
Taiya 'owa 'eguma Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhuina 'umulimuliya, 'owa beno tasigu bo nuhugu, nuwana sinagu.”

Muliyetega wete Yesu 'ihila hola Galili papalina sabi he'ita, ma boda madou hedade si'eto'autama, 'oinega Yesu waga 'aigeda 'i'aha'ahai holai 'oina 'igeluwa, 'imiyatoiya, ma boda madouna sitoholowa 'oya'oya.
Ma Yesu gwae hegehegedi baibaiwana 'oidiyega 'ihe'ita 'oidiya, 'igwaeya,
“Wahesagoha: Tobegula 'aigeda 'ina tanoha 'inaowa ma witi patuna 'isaweyanediya,
ma tupwana patu 'edai sibe'uwa, ma bwasumo si'itediya, ta sitowa dobiya ma si'aidiya.
Ma tupwana patu bale'u loda'uda'uleina 'oina sibe'uwa ma sibwala mwayamwayauwa, weyahina bale'uina 'i'iuna,
'oinega hala 'i'alasidiya ma siwelaiya, weyahina geya bale'u gogaina siloba.
Ma tupwadi patu talitali 'oidiya sibe'uwa ma sibwala hebwehebweliya, ma geya sowasowahina ma patuwedi sihuwa, weyahina talitali 'ihewaiwaiya ta 'isahila he'amasidiya.
Ma hesi tupwana patu bale'u bwebwe'ana 'oina sibe'uwa, ma sibwalama sihemadouwa ma sihuwa, ma tupwana patuwedi huwaidi 'adi baibaiwa teti, ma tupwadi sikisiti, ma wete tupwadi handeledi.
“Ceguma matenami, gwae bewa wahesagohe.”

Muliyetega boda sisawala ma Yesu 'iboinamo, ma tupwadi tomota ma 'ana tomuliyao site tuwelowedi ba'idadiyao sinaoma, ma Yesu 'oina sihesilala, sigwaeya, “Cino gwae hegehegedi to'aha 'ana nuwasabwalena?”

Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Comi moisa Yehoba 'oimiya 'itagwala ma 'ina loina huhuna 'ana tosanapuwao, ma hesi tomota baibaiwadi nuwadi 'i'elopota ma gwae hegehegedimo sihehesagohe, ma 'ana nuwasabwalena 'abwa geya sisanapu, ma wete 'ana sanapu si'ebe'ebese ma geya'abwa silobaloba. Coinega wete geya'abwa 'idi puiyao 'oidiyega sinuwanuwabui ma geya'abwa Yehoba 'inuwanuwa samudi.”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwaeya, “Togidega, 'igu gwae hegehegediyedi 'adi sanapu geya 'oimiya, 'awa? Ma togidega tupwadi gwae hegehegedi bewa gide wada sanapu 'esedi?
Tobegulaina Yehoba 'ina gwae gide patu 'isaweyaneya.
Tupwadi patuwedi sibe'uwa 'edai, gide tomotaedi Yehoba 'ina gwae sihesagoheya, ma Seitani 'inaoma eema gwaeina 'oidiyega 'i'ewa yahulediya.
“Wete gide patuwedi bale'u loda'uda'uleina 'oidiya sibe'uwa, 'adi sanapu 'abehega 'eguma tomotaedi Yehoba 'ina gwae sihesagoheya ma ma'idi yaliyaya sitagwala,

ma hesi geya walowalodi pa'alidi 'ilagudi, 'oinega sauga 'i'iuna tuwa simiyamiya, ma 'abwa to sauga 'oina Yehoba 'ina gwae 'ana hemisa weyahina mwau nuwana 'aleha siloba, beno 'oina sibe'u mwayamwayau.
“Ma patuwedi taudi talitali 'oidiya sibe'uwa 'adi sanapu 'abehega tomotaedi taudi Yehoba 'ina gwae sihesagoheya,
ma hesi 'idi nuwatuhu bale'u ma wasawasa weyahidi, 'oidiyega Yehoba 'ina gwae silohe'amasiya, ma geya sowasowahina huwaidi silagu.

“Ma 'ane patuwedi bale'u bwebwe'ana 'oina sibe'uwa, 'ana nuwasabwalena 'abehega tomotaedi taudi ma'idi tagwala moisa Yehoba 'ina gwae sihesagoheya, 'oinega huwaidi bwebwe'adi ma baibaiwadi 'ilagudiya. Tupwadi huwaidiyao teti, ma tupwadi sikisiti, ma tupwadi handeledi.”
Ma Yesu 'oidiya 'igwaeya, “Geya'abwa mayale 'asi'asilalaina ta'ahusam walata nuwana sita 'oidiya, ma hesi 'atamana talagu ma 'i'asilala,
ma 'oinega to'aha 'atemiya wadahwediya 'abwa 'asilalaina 'i'abihe latuhedi ma ta'itadi.
Ceguma matenami, gwae bewa wahesagohedi.”
Ma wete 'ihegwaediya, “Wanuwatuhuyahi ma gwae wahesagohe bwaibwaini, weyahina to'aha 'omi 'imi 'ebwaya, wete gide maisa wa'ewa, ma hesi ma 'ana loheposeyana.

Weyahina 'eguma taiya Yehoba 'ina tobwatobwa 'oina 'imiyamiya, tobwatobwaina 'iloheposeyane. Ma 'eguma taiya geya Yehoba 'ina tobwatobwa 'oina, eema to'aha bwebwe'ana 'oina 'imiyamiya Yehoba 'abwa 'oinega 'i'ewa yahuledi.”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Yehoba 'ina loina tomota 'oidiya gidemusa hewana loheya 'ina tanoha 'idauniya,
ma loheyaina 'i'enowa ma 'itoholo sabwelo ma nihuwana, ma hewanaina sibwalabwala ma sipilipili, ma hesi 'idi bwalaina 'ana lamu geya 'ida sanapuya.
Weyahina bale'u 'iloiloina 'idi bwala ma 'idi huwa weyahina.
Ma muliyetega 'abwa huwaina 'imatuha, 'oinega toni tanohaina 'ihe'ale 'etahi.”
Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya, 'igwaeya, “Togidega Yehoba 'ina hetoloina 'ana gwae hegehegedi ya'abi he'asilala 'ese 'oimiya?
Nuwana gide 'aigeda 'aiwe patuna, 'oina yagwaebala, beno seyala, weyahina seyala patuna 'i'iuna,
ma 'eguma ta'uma ma 'ibwala ma 'ihe'aiwe ma lahanao madoudi 'ilagudi, ma laganaowedi logulogudi 'oidiya bwasumowao 'idi nehwa si'abidi.”
Yesu 'ina guguya 'oina gwae hegehegedi baibaiwadi wete 'oidiyega 'ihehe'ita. Ceguma tomota 'oidiya 'imeyameyahana, ma sida sanapu.
Weyahina tauna sauga baibaiwana gwae hegehegediyega 'ilologuguya boda 'oidiya, ma 'ana tomuliyaomo 'oidiya gwae hegehegediyedi 'ilihalihasidi.
Lahilahiya Yesu 'ina he'ita wagai 'ilosalohiya, ta 'ana tomuliyao 'ihegwaediya, “Wagelu ma tahabala hali tupwa.”
Eeta sigeluwa ma sihabala ma boda holai si'ebesinediya, ma tupwadi wete wagaina simulimuliye.
Ma wediliya madouna silobeya, ta dibana wagai 'isiwasiwa taona ma 'i'iuna sidamana.
Ma Yesu waga gwahuna 'ana 'ulide 'ilaguya ma 'i'eno sineya, ma 'ana tomuliyao silohanohanoya ma sigwaeya, “Bada, 'utoholo ma 'ulememai; 'i'iuna 'a'amasa.”
Ma Yesu 'itoholowa, ta yaumai ma dibana 'iloinaediya, 'igwae, “Tuwa! Cu'emutugo ma 'udaumwala.” Coinega yaumai 'ilolaguwa ma hola mabwaiyana 'idaumwala.
Ma 'ana tomuliyao 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “To'aha weyahina wa'ateyohowa? Togidega ta geya 'imi hemisamo?”
Ma nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa ma si'ateyohowa, ma siboidimo 'oidiya sigwaeya, “Loheya to'ato'aha bewa, yaumai ma dibana 'enana simuliyeya?”
Eema sihabala ma siluhuwa meGelasine 'idi gadowa.
Siluhuwa ma Yesu 'isuluwa dabala ma loheya 'aigeda 'ilobeya hi'ahi'a 'oina, 'ina 'ebemiyaina beno duluha, 'oinega 'ilatuma,

ma duluhaina beno tomota 'adi galiha. Ma loheya bewa mwalo tomota sitohoya ma 'abehega sipai gulahega (beno seni 'oinega), ma geya sowasowahidi, weyahina gulahaedi sauga baibaiwana 'iupaupadi nimanega ma 'ahenega. Geya 'eta sawasawahina ma 'i'abiyahi, eeta 'idena sinediya ma 'itauya pwatula.
Nihuwana ma sabwelo mabwaiyana 'oidiya galiha ma 'oyai 'i'aso'asona, ma taunamo da'uleyega 'ihunuhunu hila.
Ma loheyainaina Yesu bwagebwagega 'i'iteyama, ma 'ipilima ta Yesu matana 'i'etuluha.
Cabwa tuwa 'i'aso'asona ma 'igwae, “Yesu yo, 'owa Yehoba tohewaiwai hedada Natuna, to'aha 'abehega 'utohotoho ma 'upaihowa 'oiguwa? Ya'ahwanoi 'oiuwa Yehoba saninega sahena 'u'abi'abi hemuyemuyegau.”
Gwae bewa 'igwaeneya weyahina Yesu 'ihegwae pwaiya, 'igwaeya, “Hi'ahi'a, loheya bewa 'oinega 'ulatu.”
Ma Yesu wete 'ihesilala 'igwae, “Togidega saniu?” Ma tauna 'igwaeya, “Sanigu Baibaiwa Hedada, weyahina mabodaima loheya bewa 'alona 'amiyamiya.”
Ma 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi 'ohe'ohe Yesu 'oina, 'igwaeya, “Sahena 'asa bewa 'oinega 'uulaula latuhemai.
Ma hesi 'uhewasaemai ma 'aluhu bawe bodaidi nage siduladula 'oyai.”

Yesu 'itagwalediya ma hi'ahi'aedi loheyaina 'oinega silatuwa ma siluhuwa bawe 'oidiya, eeta baweyedi sihebuwa ma mabwaiyadi sipili butubutuwa, ma 'ade'adewala si'eloula holai ma sidamana. Baweyedi 'adi baibaiwa gide tutausani.

Coinega bawe 'adi to'itayahinao 'idi matautega sidena ma silatuwa 'asai, ma ginauledi si'itediya mabwaiyana sihewasaediya 'asa madouna ma 'asa 'i'iudi tomotaedi 'oidiya. Coinega toni'asa sinaoma ma 'abehega siboimo matadiyega si'ita togidega ta 'ilatuwa.
Coinega Yesu 'oina sinaoma, ma loheyaina si'iteya, mwalo hi'ahi'a 'alona simiyamiya, debana 'idumwaluwa ma 'ale'o 'i'oteya ta 'imiyamiya. Nage 'oina mabwaiyadi si'ateyohowa.
Coinega tohalewasaedi tomota 'oidiya sihe'ote'oteteleya togidega loheyaina 'ibwebwe'ana 'esa ma bawe togidega sihesilae 'esa.
Nage 'oina toni'asa sihegaina ma Yesu silososomane ma 'abehega 'idi tupwa 'i'ebesine.
Coinega Yesu wagai 'idobidobi sabi gelu, ma loheyaina nige 'i'abihe bwebwe'aneya Yesu 'oina 'i'ahwanoiya, 'igwae, “Bada, sawasawahina yamuliyego?”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Geya sawasawahina, ma hesi 'uhila ma 'utau 'ino susuwao 'oidiya 'uhe'ote'otetele Yehoba 'ina 'atemuyemuyega 'i'abihe bwebwe'anegowa, eema sihesagohe.”
Coinega loheyaina 'itauya 'ebeloina Dikapoli 'asaina nima 'elu'eluwa 'oidiya, ma Yesu 'ina paihowao waiwaidi weyahidi 'ihe'ote'otetela, ma tomota mabwaiyadi sihesagoheya, ta nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa.
Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sihabala hila, ma boda madouna si'autama gadowaina 'oina.
Eema loheya 'aigeda sanina Yailo, loheyaina tauna hada tapwalolo 'ana to'itayahina, 'inaoma ma Yesu 'ilobeya, ma matana 'ituluha,
ma 'i'ahwanoi waiwai, 'igwaeya, “Bada, natugu mewahinena 'ana lohala 'imwau hedada. Tauna gwamasine tuwa. Nuwanuwagu 'unaoma 'u'abitoho ma 'ibwebwe'ana, ma sahena 'i'ama'amasa.”
Eeta Yesu ba'idana sinaonao, ma boda madouna sihehemulitabubu ma siheheduidui 'edai.
Bodaedi 'alodiya wahine 'aigeda ba'idadiu ma'ana lohala. Lohalaina beno bweyahina 'idaudau bolime tuwelo, ta 'abwa tuwa 'idaudau.
Mwalo to'oba baibaiwadi 'oidiya 'ina mane mabwaiyana 'ilohegumwaliya, ma hesi 'idi paihowaina 'oina geya 'ida bwebwe'ana tohona, ma hesi 'ana lohalaina 'imadomadou.
Wahineina Yesu 'ihemuli tabubuweya weyahina mwalo wasana 'ihesagoheya, ma 'atena 'inuwanuwatuhu, 'igwaeya, “Ceguma tuwa Yesu 'ana 'ale'omo ya'abitoho beno nata yabwebwe'ana.”
Coinega 'inaowa deina ma 'ana 'ale'oina 'i'abitohoya, ma bweyahina 'ina dau 'ilolagu mwayamwayauwa, ma 'iboi 'ana 'amna 'ilotohoya 'abehega 'ibwebwe'ana pwaiya.
Ta Yesu 'ilotohoya 'abehega waiwai 'oinega 'ilatuwa, ma 'i'ita lohihila, ma boda 'ihesilalediya, 'igwae, “Taiya 'agu 'ale'o 'i'abitohoya?”
Eeta 'ana tomuliyaowedi sihegwaeya, “Bada, bo'i 'u'ita pwaiya boda simiya sakowasiyegowa, ma siheheduidui, ma to'aha weyahina 'uhesilala taiya 'i'abi tohogowa?”
Ma Yesu 'ilo'ita dadana ma 'abehega 'i'ita taiya 'ina waiwai 'oina 'ihabala.

Ma wahineina 'iboi 'ilotohoya nage 'oina bwebwe'ana 'ilobeya, ma 'inaoma ma'ina dedela ma wete ma'ina 'ateyoho, eeta 'ibe'uwa ma 'i'eno talutalubu'iya Yesu matana, 'ihepwaila bwaibwaina 'abehega tauna 'ipaihoweya.
Eeta Yesu 'igwaeya, “Natugu, 'ino hemisega ta 'ubwebwe'ana. Cutoholo ma'ino yaliyaya 'utau. Cino lohalao mabwaiyana sigumwala pwaiya.”
Saugaina 'oina Yesu 'igwaegwae wahineina 'oina, ma tupwadi loheloheya wasa si'eweyama Yailo 'ina hadega, sigwaeya, “Natuu yawasina 'igumwala, ma sahena wete tohe'itaina 'ina sauga 'u'abi'abiyahi.”
Ma Yesu wete wasaina 'ihesagoheya, ta Yailo 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Sahena 'u'ate'ateyoho, ma hesi 'uhemisegau.”
Coinega Yesu boda madouna 'i'ausidiya ma sahena simulimuliye, ma hesi 'ana tomuliyao sitetoi ba'idanao, beno Pita ma Yemesa ma tasina tauna Yoni,
sinaonao ta Yailo 'ina hada silatuwa, ma wui ma dou madouna sihesagoheya.
Ta Yesu 'iluhuwa ma 'ihegwaediya, “To'aha weyahina wawuiwui ma wadoudou? Gwama bewa geya 'i'amasa, tuwa 'i'eno'eno.” Ma sihenamaeya.
Sihehenama, eeta Yesu 'ipa'idiya ta silatuwa 'atamana, ma gwama tamana ma sinana ma'ana tomuliyao sitetoiyedi Yesu ba'idanao siluhuwa gwamaina 'ina 'ebe'enowa.
Ma gwamaina nimana Yesu 'i'abiya ma 'igwaeya, “Talita kumi.” Ma 'ana bui, “Gwamasine 'utoholoma.”
Nage 'oina 'itoholo mwayamwayauwa ma 'iyawala, weyahina 'ana bolime tuwelo 'ilobeya. Tamana ma sinana nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa moisa.
Ma Yesu 'i'ausidiya, 'igwae, “Sahena taiya 'eta 'oina wahehepwaila 'igu paihowa bewa weyahina, ma hesi gwama 'ana wa'ebwae ma 'i'ai.”
Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao 'asa nage si'ebesineya ma sihilama 'ina 'asa.

Ma Sabatiya 'idi hada tapwalolo 'oina 'iluhuwa 'ihehe'ita, ma tomota sihesagoheya, ta mabwaiyadi nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa 'ina sanapu ma 'ina paihowa weyahidi, ma sigwaeya, “Loheya bewa to'ehega 'ina sonoga 'ilobeya? Ma wete paihowaedi waiwaidi nimanega 'ipaihowediya ma to'ehega waiwaiina 'ilobeya?”
Ma sigwaeya, “Loheya bewa to'abi hada tuwa. Ma sinana Meli, ma tasinao Yemesa ta Yosese ta Yudasa ta Saimoni, ta wete nuhunao ba'idadao tamiyamiya, 'awa?” Coinega Yesu silogwahateya.
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Palopitao sihe'asisiyanedi hali 'asa 'oidiya, ma taudi 'idi 'asa geya. Weyahina tuwa taudi 'idi bodao, wete 'idi susuwao, silologwahatedi.”

Coinega Yesu nuwana 'ihepwanopwanowa weyahina tomotaedi geya sihemise, eeta geya sawasawahina ma paihowa waiwaidi 'ebwa 'ipaihowadi. Beno tuwa tolohalao tupwadi 'i'abi tohodiya ma sibwebwe'ana. Coinega Yesu 'isakowasiya 'asa 'oidiya, 'ihehe'ita.

Ma 'ana tomuliyao site tuwelo 'ibwauwediya, ma 'iloinaediya ma 'abehega 'eluwa 'eluwa sisakowasi 'asa 'oidiya, ma wete loina ma waiwai 'i'ebwaediya ma 'oinega sawasawahidi hi'ahi'a tomota 'oidiyega siula latuhedi,
ta 'ina guguya 'oina 'iloinaediya, 'igwae, “Geya'abwa 'eta to'aha wa'ewa'ewa. Sahena 'e'ahai nuwana peha bo mane. Beno tuwa 'imi guna nimamiya,
ma 'ami butu wa'otedi, ma hesi sahena 'wama 'eluwa wa'ote'otedi.”
Ma wete 'ihegwaediya, “Ceguma to hada 'oina sibwauwegomiya ma 'oina waluhuluhu, hadaina 'oina wahehada ma 'ana siga tupwaina wa'ebesine.

Ma hesi 'eguma 'asa tupwadi 'oidiya walatu ma tomotaedi geya sibwauwegomi ma wete geya 'imi loguguya sihesagohe, 'asaedi 'ahemi gawalana 'oina walohutuhutu yahule ma wa'ebesine, ma 'oinega wahe'itadi 'abehega nata mwau 'oidiya 'ilatu.”
Coinega 'ana tomuliyaowedi sisakowasiya 'asa mabwaiyana 'oidiya, siguguya ma 'abehega tomota mumugadi galana silogwahatedi ma sinuwabui,
ta hi'ahi'a tomota 'oidiyega siula latuhedi ta tolohalao mabwaiyadi wete siheholoidi ma sibwebwe'ana.

Coinega Yesu wasana tomota sihewasa dadaneya 'asa mabwaiyana 'oidiya, ma Kini Helodi 'ihesagoheya. Weyahina tupwana tomota sigwaegwae 'abehega, “Yoni to'abihebabitaiso 'amasega 'itoholo hila, ma ma'ina waiwai madouna 'ipaipaihowa.”
Ma tupwadi sigwae 'abehega, “Tauna tuwa Ilaitiya.” Ma wete tupwadi sigwae, “Tauna palopita 'aigeda gide palopitaowedi nugenugetaidi.”
Helodi wete wasana 'ihesagoheya ma 'igwae, “Nuwana tauna Yoni to'abihebabitaiso. Mwalo yalohe'amasiya, ma nuwana 'itoholohila.”

Weyahina mwalo Helodi Yoni 'i'abiyahiya ma deliya 'ipaiya, ma Yoni 'ana 'abiyahina lamuna beno wahine 'aigeda sanina Helodiyasa, beno Helodi tasina Pilipi mwanena ma Helodi 'i'eweya, ta ba'idana sihaiya.
Eema Yoni Helodi 'ihegwaeya 'abehega, “Nage geya mumuga bwebwe'ana,” weyahina tasina mwanena ma 'ihaiya.
Ma Yoni 'ina guguyaina weyahina wahineina 'inuwagala ma nuwanuwana Yoni 'ida lohe'amasi, ma hesi geya sawasawahina,

weyahina Helodi 'inuwahiya 'abehega Yoniina tauna loheya dumwadumwaluna Yehoba 'ina topaihowa 'aigeda, 'oinega Helodi Yoni 'ihe'asisiyeya, ma sauga baibaiwana Helodi nuwanuwana ma Yoni 'ina gwae 'ihesagohe, ma weyahina 'i'ateyohowa.

Eeta Helodiina 'ina sauga li'u 'ana sabwelo 'ilatuwa ma Helodiyasa 'eda'eda 'inuwalobeya Yoni 'ana lohe'amasa weyahina. Sabwelo li'u 'ana 'ebenuwa tuhuyahina 'e'ahaina si'atububuya, ma tupwadi taumanao sitoedima 'aiina 'oina. Taumanaedi gabemani 'adi tohanugetao ma tolo'aleha 'adi tohanugetao, ma wete tupwadi Galili 'asaina 'adi babadao.

Saugaina Helodiina ma 'ana taumanao si'ai'ai, Helodiyasa natuna mewahinena 'iluhuma matadiya ma selowega 'i'abihe yaliyayediya. Eeta Helodi gumalaulauina 'oina 'igwae helauwa 'igwae, “Ceguma to'aha 'ino hesinuwa ma 'oiguwa 'u'ahwanoi, yatagwala 'oiuwa.”
Ma wete 'ibwauhaneya tamada, 'igwaeya, “Moisa tuwa yagwae hemisa, to'aha nuwanuwau ya'ebwaego, 'eguma 'u'ahwanoi 'igu 'ebeloina weyahina yawatahi, ma tupwana ya'ebwaego.”

Coinega gumalaulauina 'ihapwesa, ma 'itauya sinana 'oina, 'ihesilala, 'igwae, “Sinagu to'aha 'ino nuwatuhu ma kini 'oina ya'ahwanoiye?” Ma sinana 'igwaeya, “Kini 'uhegwae, 'ugwae, ‘Nuwanuwagu Yoni to'abihebabitaiso mwaguna.’”
Eeta gumalaulauina 'ilomwayamwayauwa, ma 'ihila kina 'oina, 'igwaeya, “Nuwanuwagu sauga bewa Yoni to'abihebabitaiso mwaguna gaeba 'oina 'udo'o, ma 'u'ebwaegau.”
Helodi 'inuwagala, ma geya sawasawahina ma 'iguipaila, weyahina 'ibwauhaneya tamada taumanaowedi wete matadiya,
eeta deli 'ana to'itayahi 'aigeda 'iloinaeya 'abehega 'itauya ma Yoni mwaguna 'i'upweyama. Ta 'oinega to'ita yahinina deliya 'itauya ma Yoni 'ani'ona 'i'upweya,
ta mwaguna gaeba 'ido'oya ta 'i'eweyama gumalaulauina 'i'ebwaeya, ma tauna 'i'ahaliya, 'itauyeya sinana 'oina.
Ma Yoni 'ana tomuliyao 'ina 'amasa wasana sihesagoheya, ma sinaoma ma Yoni wahina si'eweya ma sigaliheya.
Ma Yesu 'ina topaihowao site tuwelo sihilama ma Yesu 'oina 'idi paihowa ma 'idi he'ita mabwaiyana sihepwailediya.

Ma tomota baibaiwadi sinaonaoma ma sihilahila, ta 'oinega geya sawasawahina ma Yesu 'ana tomuliyao si'aiyawasi ma si'ai, 'oinega 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Tupwa bewa ta'ebesine ma tatauya yoho 'awawa, ma nobwa tupwana wa'aiyawasi.”
Eeta siboidimo wagai sigeluwa, ma sihabala 'aigeda tupwaina 'oina, beno yoho 'awawa.

Ma bodaedi Yesu ma'ana tomuliyaowedi 'idi geluina si'iteya, ma sisanapuya tupwaina 'oina sitautauya, 'oinega taudi ma 'asa mabwaiyadi 'adi tomiyao wete mahetediyao 'edega sipilipili, ma silatu nugeta tupwainaina 'oina.

Cabwa muliyetega waga 'iluhuwa ma Yesu 'isuluwa dabala, ma boda madouna nenegwala 'i'itediya ma 'i'ate muyamuyaediya, weyahina taudi gide sipiyao geya 'adi to'itayahinamo, 'oinega 'ihe'aleya ma sanapu baibaiwana 'ihe'itaeya 'oidiya.
Ma lahilahiya 'ana tomuliyaowedi sinaoma, ma Yesu 'oina sigwaeya, “Bada, tupwa bewa yoho 'awawa ma sinala 'isopusopu,
'oinega bodaedi bewa 'uhesumanedi, ma sitauya, ma 'adi sigimwane 'asai ma hada deidiya 'oidiya.”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Ma togidega? Comi geya sowana wahe'aidi, 'awa?” Ma 'ana tomuliyao sigwaeya, “Bada, geya sawasawahina, weyahina mabwaiyadi 'adi 'ana maisa gide tausani kina.”
Ta Yesu 'ihesilalediya, 'igwae, “Hisa beledi 'oimiya. Watauya wa'ebesa.” Sitauya ma silobeya, ma Yesu sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Beledi nima ma silahana 'eluwa 'alobediya.”
Coinega boda 'iloinediya ma mabwaiyadi simiyatoiya boda ma boda pwatula 'oina.
Ceeta siwatahidiya simiyatoiya, boda tupwadi handeledi, ma boda tupwadi pipiti.

Ma beledi nima ma silahana 'eluwaedi 'i'ewediya, ma galewa 'ilo'ita haneya ma 'igwae helau 'e'ahaiyedi weyahidi, ma muliyetega belediyedi 'ihisidiya ma 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'i'ebwaediya, eeta siheguyaiyediya. Ma silahana 'eluwaedi wete gidemusa 'ihisidiya ma 'i'ebwaediya.
Coinega mabwaiyadi si'aiya ma simwausuwa.
Ma beledi ma silahana tupwatupwadi sidomwa 'autediya ma kodo tuwelo silohemahediya.
To'aiyedi loheloheyamo sihasilidiya 'adi baibaiwa gide paibi tausani.
Cigumwala ma 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'iloinaediya ma wagai sigelu, 'igwaeya, “Wagelu ma wanugeta Bedeseida hali tupwa, ma taugu 'abwa boda yahetauidi ma sihila 'idi 'asa.”
Coinega sigeluwa ma Yesu boda 'ihetauidiya, ma muliyetega 'ihaneya 'oyai sabi 'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina.
Ciboi pwaiya ma 'ana tomuliyaowedi ni'u 'awawa si'ada'adau, ma tauna 'iboinamo 'oya'oya,

'i'itediya 'idi wose 'oinega wahidi 'isabulolowa, weyahina yaumai matadiyega 'itowatowama. Ma sauga 'i'iuna ma gona 'i'adale, eeta Yesu hola debanega 'itauya ma 'abehega deidiyega 'inao ma 'i'ebesinedi.
Eeta 'ana tomuliyaowedi Yesu si'iteya hola debanega 'inaonaoma, ma 'idi nuwatuhu 'abehega welabana,
'oinega simatauta ma siwuiya. Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Sahena wa'ate'ateyoho. Taugu tuwa, 'imi Badaina.”
Ma wagai 'igeluwa ba'idanao ma yaumai 'igumwala. Ma nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa madouna,

weyahina Yesu 'ina waiwai lamuna geya sinuwa sabwalena. Ceguma saugenina tomota baibaiwadi 'adi beledi Yesu 'iheguyaiya ma lamuna sida sanapuya ma 'oinega nuwadi 'ida sabwalena, ma hesi geya sida sanapuya, weyahina nuwadi 'i'elopota.
Coinega sihabala tupwa Genesaleta gadowaina 'oina, siluhuwa, ma 'idi waga nage 'oina silohoya.
Ma saugaina sisuluma toni 'asaedi Yesu si'inaneya,
ma 'oinega tomotaedi sihila 'asa mabwaiyana 'oidiya ma tolohalao si'ewedima 'ebe'eno 'oidiyega, ma Yesu 'oina sitauyediya, 'eguma sihesagohe to tupwa 'oina 'imiyamiya.

Ma Yesu 'isakowasi tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya, tupwana 'asa madouna ma 'asa 'i'iudi ma tanoha 'oidiya. Ma tomota baibaiwadi 'idi tolohalao si'ewedima 'ebe maketi 'oidiya siyamwayamwa, ma si'ahwanoiyeya, sigwae, “Bada, sawasawahina 'ima tolohalaowedi 'a 'ale'o papalina si'abitoho?” Eeta Yesu 'oidiya 'itagwala. Coinega taudi 'ana 'ale'o si'abitohoya ta sibwebwe'ana.
Ta Palisiyao ma loina 'ana tohe'itao tupwadi wete ba'idadiyao Yelusalemega sinaoma ma Yesu 'oina sihegogona,
ma tupwadi 'ana tomuliyao si'ita lobediya manima bi'ibi'idi si'ai'ai, geya nimadi sideulidi.
Weyahina Palisiyao ma wete meYudiya mabwaiyadi mumugadi tubudiyaowega tuwa gide, nugeta nimadi sideuli bwaibwainidi 'abwa si'ai.
Ma 'eguma 'ebe gimwane 'oinega sinaoma nimadi sideuli nugete 'abwa si'ai. Ma wete loina baibaiwana tubudiyao 'oidiyega gaeba ma biyo ma walata 'adi deula weyahina simulimuliye.
Coinega bewa Palisiyao ma loina 'ana tohe'itaowedi Yesu 'oina sihesilala, sigwae, “To'aha weyahina 'a tomuliyaowedi tubudao 'idi loina geya sihe'asisiyanedi, ma manima bi'ibi'idi si'ai?”

Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya 'igwae, “Comi to'e'abo'abo. Mwalona Aiseya palopita weyahimi 'igwae nugeta bwaibwaina, Yehoba 'ina gwae ta sileleya bewa gide: Tomotaedi 'ahwadiyega sihe'asisiyanegau, ma hesi 'atediyega geya.
Ma wete 'oiguwa sitapwatapwalolo bwagabwaga, weyahina 'idi he'itao taugu geya 'oiguwega, ma hesi tomota tuwa 'idi nuwatuhuwega.”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya wete, 'igwae, “Mumugami galana! Yehoba 'ina loina wadahweya ma hesi tubumiyao mumugadi wamulimuliyedi.”
Ma wete 'igwaeya, “Cabehega 'omi tosanapu moisa, ma hesi geya; weyahina Yehoba 'ina loinao waguiguipailedi, ma hesi tubumiyao mumugadi wa'abi'abi yahidi.
Mwalo Mosese Yehoba 'ina loina moisa 'i'ebwaediya, 'igwae, ‘Tamau ma sinau 'uhe'asisiyanedi.’ Ma wete, ‘Ceguma taiya tamana ma sinana 'i'ahwa galagalaedi 'ilobwaineya ma walohe'amasi.’

Ma 'omi 'imi he'ita 'abo'aboina wagwae, ‘Ceguma 'aigeda taiya tamana ma sinana 'ihegwaedi, 'igwae, “Cigu tobwatobwao yatagwala pwaiyeya Yehoba 'oina ma hehe'asisiyaina, 'oinega geya sawasawahina ma yalemegomi.” ’
Bewa 'imi loinaina 'oinega loheya tamana ma sinana 'adi lema wa'au'ausi.
Tubumiyao 'idi loina bewa 'oinega, Yehoba 'ina loina waheginaula bwagebwageya, ma 'imi he'itao baibaiwadi gide geya Mosese 'ina loinao Yehoba 'oinega.”
Coinega boda 'ibwau hiledima ma 'ihegwaediya, “Cigu gwae bewa mabwaiyami wahesagohe, ma nuwami 'i'elo'asilala.
Geya 'eta to'aha ta'ai ma si'abi'abi hebi'igita, ma hesi ginauledi 'atedega silatulatu sawasawahidi ma si'abihe bi'igita.”
Eeta Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao boda si'ebesinediya ma hadai siluhuwa, eema 'ana tomuliyaowedi sihesilaleya sigwae, “Sawasawahina 'ino gwae hegehegediina 'ulihasi 'oima?”
Eeta Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Nuwana 'omi wete nuwami geya 'i'elo'asilala, 'awa? Coinega geya wasanapu 'abehega to'aha ta'ai'ai ma 'iluhuluhu 'aloda geya wete 'ida 'abihebi'igita,

weyahina geya 'ateda 'iluhu, ma hesi gamwadamo 'oina 'iluhuwa ma muliyetega 'ilatu mohomoho 'oina.” (Yesu 'ina he'ita bewa 'ana sanapu 'abehega geya 'eta wete 'e'ahai hehe'asisina, ma hesi mabwaiyana ta'ai.)
Ma Yesu wete 'igwaeya, “To'aha tomota 'atediyega silatulatu sawasawahina ma si'abihe galegita,
gidemusa nuwatuhu galana ma logwali, yagaha, lohe'amasa, pui,
lomata tobwatobwa, gamwasowala, 'abo, ganawala, he'ipi'ipi, sinala, nuwahane, ma heyauyaule.
Bewa ginauledi galadi tomota 'alodiyega silatulatu ma sigihegihe bi'idi.”

Nage 'oina Yesu 'itoholowa ma 'itauya Taiya ma Saidoni tupwaidiina, ma 'aigeda hada 'oina 'iluhuwa, weyahina geya nuwana ma tomota sisanapu 'ina latu weyahina, ma hesi geya sawasawahina ma 'i'edahwana,

weyahina 'aigeda wahine Yesu 'ina latu wasana 'ihesagoheya. Ma wahineina geya wahine Yudiya ma hesi tauna gwama Pinisiya, tupwa Siliya 'alonega, ma natuna mewahinena hi'ahi'a 'i'abi hegaleya, eeta sinana 'inaoma ma Yesu 'ahena 'ituluha ma 'i'ahwanoiya ma 'abehega hi'ahi'a natuna 'oinega 'ida pa'i.
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Cilobwaineya ma sedaseda 'adiwa ya'ebwaya nugetedi, ma geya sawasawahina ma sedaseda 'adiwa 'edewa ya'ebwaedi.”
Ma wahine 'igwaeya, “Cehe moisa Bada, ma hesi 'edewa 'ebe'ai gabulena sedaseda 'adiwa mohomohona 'oinega si'ai'ai.”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Yauwedo! Beno gwae moisa. Coinega 'utoholo ma 'uhila 'ino hada. Hi'ahi'a natuu 'oinega 'ilatuwa ma 'ibwebwe'ana.”
Eeta wahineina 'itoholowa ma 'itauya 'ina hada, ma natunaina 'ilobeya 'ina 'ebe'eno 'oina 'ibwebwe'ana pwaiya.
Ma Yesu Taiya 'i'ebesineya, ta 'itauya Saidoni, 'oinega wete 'ihataona Dikapoli tupwaina 'oidiya, ma 'ihapwesama Galili holai.
Ma 'aigeda loheya si'eweyama Yesu 'oina, tauna tenatuituina ma wete guguguguina, ma Yesu si'ahwanoiyeya ma 'abehega 'i'abitoho ma 'ibwebwe'ana.

Ma Yesu loheyaina 'itoeya ma boda 'oidiyega sihawasiya siboidimo, ma Yesu nima matagigina 'oinega loheya tenana 'ilagu luhuwediya, ma muliyetega 'iboi nimana 'i'esoheya ma loheya memenana 'i'abitohoya,
'oinega Yesu 'ilo'ita hane galewa, ma 'atemuyemuyega 'igwaeya, “Epapata,” beno 'ana bui “Culosabwalena.”
Eeta loheyaina tenana silosabwalena, ma wete memenana 'ibwebwe'ana, ma sawasawahina 'igwae ma 'ihesagoha dumwalu.
Ma Yesu tomota 'i'etobodediya ma 'abehega geya'abwa taiya 'oina sida hehepwaila. Ma 'etobodaina geya sihesagohe, ma hesi sihe'ote'otetela dadaneya tomota 'oidiya.

Tomotaedi sihesagoheya nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa madouna, ma sigwae, “Cina paihowa mabwaiyana bwebwe'ana ma 'ebenuwa pwanopwano, weyahina totenatui ma guguguguidi 'i'abihe bwebwe'anediya ta sowasowahina sihegwaegwae, ma sihesagoha.”
Sauga nage 'oina boda madouna wete sihegogonama Yesu 'oina, ma geya 'adimo. Coinega 'ana tomuliyao 'ibwauwedima, ma 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae,
“Tomota bewa ya'ate muyamuyaediya, weyahina sabwelo 'etoi 'ebwa ba'idadao tamiyamiya, ma geya 'adimo.
Ceguma magomaledi yahesumanedi, tabu ma 'edai sihemwalomwalohana, weyahina tupwadi bwagebwagega sitauyama.”
Eeta Yesu 'ana tomuliyaowedi sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Togidega tupwa yoho 'awawa 'oina tomotaedi bewa 'adi taloba 'ese?”
Coinega Yesu 'ihesilalediya, 'igwae, “Hisa 'ami belediyao simiyamiya?” Ma sigwae, “Sebenimo.”

Eeta boda 'iloinediya ma bale'uwa simiyatoiya. Simiyatoiya ma beledi sebeniyedi 'i'ewediya ma weyahidi 'iloyauwedowa Yehoba 'oina, ma 'i'ehisihisiya, 'i'ebwaediya 'ana tomuliyao 'oidiya, ma tomota si'ebwaediya, eema siheguyai sakowasiyeya.
Ma wete tupwana silahana 'i'iudi simiyamiya, weyahidi Yesu 'igwae helauwa Yehoba 'oina, ma 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'iloinediya, ma siheguyaiyedi tomota 'oidiya.
Coinega mabwaiyadi si'aiya ta simwausuwa, ma muliyetega 'e'ahai tupwatupwadi sidomweya ma kodo sebeni silohemahediya.
Ma bodaedi 'adi baibaiwa gide powa tausani. Eeta 'ihewasa hilediya.
Tuta nage 'oina 'ana tomuliyao ba'idanao 'idi waga sigeluwa ma sinaowa Dalimanuta tupwaina.
Eeta Palisiyao sinaoma, ma Yesu 'oina sihe'ohe'ohena, ma sitohoya ma 'abehega galewega 'ila'ilala 'ida he'itae 'oidiya.
Ma Yesu ma'ina nuwagala 'ihegwaediya 'igwae, “Togidega ma 'oinega yaso bewa nuwanuwami 'ila'ilala, ma hesi geya 'eta wa'ita.”
Coinega 'i'ebesinediya ma wagai 'igeluwa, ma sihabala hali tupwa.
Ma hesi 'adi haite sinuwanaideya, ma beledi 'aigeda tuwa wagai 'itupwa.
Ma Yesu 'ihemataluwediya, 'igwae, “Wa'ita Palisiyao ma Helodi 'adi beledi 'ana 'ebe 'abiheseseha 'oinega wa'ita yahigomi.”
Coinega tomuliyaowedi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwaeya, “Yesu 'ina gwaeina lamuna weyahina 'ada haiteina tanuwanaideya.”

Ma Yesu 'idi nuwatuhu 'isanapuya, 'oinega 'ihegwaediya, “To'aha weyahina wagwaegwae 'abehega geya 'ami haitemo? Beno geya weyahina taugu yagwaegwae. Togidega 'imi nuwatuhu si'elopota ma geya sawasawahina ma 'igu gwae lamuna wasanapu.
Mamatami ma geya wa'ita, ma wete matenami ma geya wada hesagoha, 'oinega geya'abwa wanuwanuwa tuhuyahi 'igu paihowao boda 'adi he'ai weyahina, 'awa?
Tutaina beledi nima 'oinega tomota paibi tausani yahe'aidiya hisa kodo 'ulaheya 'oidiyega wahegogonediya?” Ma sigwae “Tuwelo.”
Ma Yesu 'ihenaida wete 'igwaeya, “Ma tutaina beledi sebeni 'oinega tomota powa tausani yahe'aidiya, ma hisa kodo 'ulaheya 'oidiyega wahegogoneya?” Ma sigwae, “Sebeni.”
Coinega Yesu 'igwaeya, “Comi togidega ta geya nuwami 'ida sabwalena.”
Eeta Bedeseida 'oina sitauyama, ma loheya 'aigeda mata gibugibuina sitoeyama Yesu 'oina, si'ahwanoiyeya 'abehega 'i'abitoho ma 'ibwebwe'ana.

Coinega Yesu tomata gibugibuina nimana 'oina 'i'abiya ma 'itoeya, 'asaina si'ebesineya. Ma Yesu loheyaina matana 'ihulasiya, ma nimanega matanaina 'i'abitohodiya, ma 'ihegwaeya, “Sawasawahina to'aha 'u'itadi?”
Coinega loheyaina 'ilo'ita dadana ma 'igwaeya, “Tomota ya'itediya, ma 'adi 'ita gide tuwa 'aiwe si'e'elo yawala.”
Ma wete Yesu loheyaina matana 'i'abitoho hilediya, ma 'i'ebubuna, eeta 'i'asilala bwaibwaina, ma ginaula mabwaiyadi 'i'itediya.
Coinega Yesu 'ihewasaeya, 'igwae, “Geya'abwa 'uhilahila 'asa madouna 'oina, ma hesi 'utauya 'uboi 'ino hada.”
Ta Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sinaonao Sisaliya Pilipai tupwaidi weyahidi ma 'edai 'ana tomuliyaowedi 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Togidega tomota 'idi gwae weyahigu wahesagohediya 'abehega taiya taugu?”
Ma tomuliyaowedi sigwae, “Tomota tupwadi sigwaeya 'abehega 'owa Yoni To'abihebabitaiso, ma wete tupwadi sigwae 'abehega 'owa Ilaitiya, ma tupwadi sigwae 'abehega 'owa palopita nugenugetaina 'aigeda.”
Coinega wete 'ihesilalediya, “Ma 'omi togidega 'imi nuwatuhu 'abehega taugu taiya?” Eema Pita 'ihemaiseya 'igwae, “Cowa Keliso To'abihetenaina.”
Ma Yesu 'iloina pa'alediya, 'igwae, “Geya sawasawahina 'eta taiya 'oina wahehepwailegau.”

Ma Yesu 'ihe'ale 'ihe'ita 'oidiya to'aha 'abwa 'oina 'ilatu, ma 'igwaeya, “Taugu Loheyaiguina 'abwa muya madouna yaloba. Weyahina babada ta topwaoli madoudi ta loina 'ana tohe'itao 'abwa silogwahategau ma silohe'amasigau, ma sabwelo 'etoi mulina 'abwa yatoholo hila.”

Yesu 'ina gwaeina bewa 'oinega 'ilagu hemasalaheya 'ina 'amasa weyahina. Coinega Pita Yesu 'itoeya, ma mahetena sinaowa hagana, ma Pitaina 'i'ausiya ma 'abehega ginauledi sahena silatulatu Yesu 'oina.

Ma Yesu 'ihasakowasi ma 'ana tomuliyao 'i'e'ebubudiya, ma 'iheliya Pita 'oina, 'igwaeya, “Cowa Seitani, bewa sauga 'u'ebesinegau! Weyahina 'ino nuwatuhuwedi nuwatuhu 'asa gabulena 'ana nuwatuhu, ma hesi geya Yehoba 'ina nuwatuhu gide.”

Coinega Yesu boda mabwaiyadi ma wete 'ana tomuliyao mahetediyao 'ibwau he'autedima, ma 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Taiya 'eguma nuwanuwana ma 'imuliyegau, 'ilobwaineya ma 'iboi 'ina loina 'ilogwahate, ma 'aneyage 'iboi 'ana kelose 'i'ahali ma 'i'amasa, beno gide 'ana 'eda'eda, 'eguma taiya 'imuliyegau.”
Ma hesiyage 'eguma taiya yawasina 'inuwahi, 'abwa yawasinaina 'ihe'wadalele. Ma 'eguma taiya weyahigu ma wasana bwebwe'ana weyahina yawasina 'itagwale ma 'i'amasa, tauna 'abwa yawasi moisa 'iloba.
Ma 'eguma 'ida wasawasao bale'uwa madou hedadedi talobediya beno ginaula bwagabwaga, ma hesi ginaula madou hedada beno yawasida moisa.
Weyahina 'eguma yawasida moisa tahe'wadalele, beno geya wete 'eta 'ana hemiyalae 'imiyamiya.

“Ma 'eguma taiya 'owa weyahigu 'uhedeba mwadimwadina, wete 'igu he'itao weyahidi 'uhedeba mwadimwadina, ma 'uuhalegau yaso bewa galadi ma ganaganawalidi matadiya, 'abwa taugu Loheyaiguina wete yauhalego, tutaina Tamagu 'ina wasawasa maemaedanaina 'oinega yahilama ma aneloseyao wete ba'idagwao.”
Ma wete Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Moisa tuwa, tupwami 'oimiyega geya'abwa wa'ama'amasa ma 'ana siga Yehoba 'ina loina waiwaina 'ilatuma ma wa'ita.”
Sabwelo sikisi mulina Yesu 'ana tomuliyao 'etoi 'itoediya, taudi Pita ma Yemesa ma Yoni ba'idanao sihaneya 'oya 'aigeda dudulena 'oina, ma siboi simiyamiya, si'iteya Yesu maninina 'imaedana
ma 'ana 'ale'o wa'ewa'e'ena moisa, ma 'ana 'ita geya 'eta taiya bale'uwa sowasowana ma 'ale'oina 'ihe'ehau hila 'ana wa'ewa'e'eina gide.
Ma wete Ilaitiya ma Mosese sihapwesama ma Yesuina ba'idadiu sihehegwaegwae.
Coinega Pita Yesu 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Bada, 'ida miya bewa bwebwe'ana, 'oinega 'imi hadahada 'etoi 'a'abidi, 'aigeda 'owa weyahiu, 'aigeda Mosese, ma 'aigeda Ilaitiya.”
Beno Pita 'igwaegwae bwagabwaga weyahina tauna ma'iyanao simatauta hedadeya.
Eeta yaloyaloha wete 'isuluwa ma 'i'ahusamudiya. Yaloyalohaina 'oinega 'aigeda 'enana sihesagoheya, 'igwae, “Bewa natugu bwebwe'ana hedada, ma 'ina gwae wahesagohe.”
Ma silomwayamwayauwa ma silo'ita dadana, ma Yesu 'iboinamo, ma geya 'eta wete taiya si'ita.
Coinega 'oyega sisulusuluma ma Yesu 'iloinaediya, 'igwae, “Ginauledi nige wa'ita pwaidiya geya'abwa tomota 'oidiya wahehepwailedi eema 'ana siga taugu Loheyaiguina 'amasega yatoholo hilama.”
Coinega ginauledi sidahwediya, ma siboi sihehegwaegwae, sigwaeya, “Cina gwaeina toholohila weyahina togidega 'ana sanapu?”
Ma Yesu 'oina sihesilala wete, sigwaeya, “To'aha weyahina loina 'ana tohe'itao sigwae 'abehega Ilaitiya 'inugetama, ma gwahunega To'abihetenaina 'itautauyama?”

Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Cehe gidemusa. Ilaitiya 'abehega 'ilatu nugetama, ma 'oinega ginaula mabwaiyana 'i'abihe dumwaludi. Ma hesi Ilaitiyaina 'ilatu pwaima, ma tomota sipaihowa galagala 'oina gide 'idi nuwatuhu, to'aha gide Buki Tabu 'ihepwaila nugeteya. Ma wete taugu Loheyaiguina to'aha weyahina Buki Tabu 'ihepwaila nugetegauwa 'abehega muya baibaiwadi yalobadi, ma wete tomota silogwahategau?”
Eeta 'oyega sisuluma ma 'ana tomuliyao mabwaiyadi siloba hilediya, ma boda baibaiwadi ba'idadiyao ma wete loina 'ana tohe'itao ba'idadiyao sihe'ohe'oheya.
Ma tutaina boda Yesu si'inaneya nuwadi 'ipwanopwanowa madouna, ma sipilipili mwayamwayau sabi 'itaina.
Sipilima ma Yesu 'idi he'ohe'ohe weyahina 'ihesilalediya, 'igwae, “To'aha weyahina wahehegwaegwae?”
Ma 'aigeda loheya bodaedi 'oidiyega Yesu 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Bada, 'idi he'ohe'ohe lamuna natugu, weyahina 'ina lohala 'oinega geya sawasawahina ma 'igwae.

Tuta tupwana hi'ahi'a 'ina paihowega 'itaitai ma 'ahwanega gwalabusobuso sihapwehapwesa, ma 'ihesala'i'ita ma 'idededela. Coinega 'a tomuliyao ya'ahwanoiyedi ma 'abehega hi'ahi'a gwama 'oinega sipa'ihapwese, ma geya sowasowadi.”
Coinega Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Comi togidega, ta deba pa'ala hedade? Tuta bewa 'imi deba pa'ala 'oinega yahewahi dabalala. Tuwa gwamaina watauyeyama ma ya'ita.”
Eeta gwamaina si'eweyama Yesu 'oina, ma hi'ahi'a 'i'iteya Yesu, 'oinega 'iginaoya gwamaina ma 'itai ma bale'uwa 'ibe'uwa, 'idededela ma 'ahwanega gwala busobuso silatulatu.
Ma tamanaina 'oina Yesu 'ihesilala, 'igwae, “To tuta 'oina 'ina lohala 'ihegaineya?” Ma tamana 'igwaeya, “Cina tuta sedasedega.
Ma 'eguma 'itai, sauga tupwana 'ibe'u 'aiwe 'ala'alasina 'oidiya ma sauga tupwana bwasi ni'una 'oidiya, nata eeta 'ilohe'amasi. Coinega 'eguma sowasowana 'uda 'atemuyamuya ma 'u'abihetemai.”
Ma Yesu loheyaina 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Cugwae pwaiya, ‘Ceguma sowasowana,’ 'awa? Ma hesi 'unuwatuhuyahi 'abehega 'eguma tahemisa, ginaula mabwaiyana sawasawahina 'oida.”
Nage 'oina loheyaina 'igwae hedahedada, “Moisa tuwa yahemisa, ma geya yahemisa hedada. Nuwanuwagu ma 'igu hemisa 'ugihewaiwaiye.”

Ma boda baibaiwadi sipilipilima Yesu 'i'itediya, 'oinega hi'ahi'a 'iheliyeya, 'igwae, “Cowa hi'ahi'a 'ino paihowega, gwama 'iheyauyauleya, yaloinego ma 'u'ebesine hatae, ma geya sowana wete 'uluhuluhu hila 'oina.”

Coinega hi'ahi'aina 'i'aso'asona, ma 'ana hebwasubwasumo 'iginaoya, ma 'idedela madouna, ma hi'ahi'aina 'ihapwesa 'itauya, ma boda gwamaina si'iteya 'ana 'ita gide 'i'amasa, ma simatauteya ma sigwae, “Beno 'i'amasa.”
Ma Yesu gwama nimana 'i'abiya ma 'i'abihe toholoya, ta gwamaina 'itoholowa ma'ina bwebwe'ana.
Muliyetega Yesu ma 'ana tomuliyao siluhu hadai ma nobwa siboi. Eeta tomuliyaowedi Yesu sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Bada, togidega tauma geya sawasawahina hi'ahi'a 'apa'i ma 'ihapesa?”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Geya 'eta wete ginaula 'oinega ma hi'ahi'a tapa'ihapwese. Beno tuwa 'ahwanoiyega Yehoba 'oina.”

Nage 'oinega Yesu ma 'ana tomuliyao tupwaina si'ebesineya, ma Yesu geya nuwana ma boda sisanapu to'eha 'oina sitauya, 'oinega Galili 'edaina 'oina sitautauya, ma 'ana tomuliyao 'ihe'itediya 'ina 'amasa weyahina, 'igwaeya, “Cabwa Loheyaiguina 'agu toteba 'i'ebwayaegau 'agu 'alehao 'oidiya ma silohe'amasigau.
Eeta sabwelo 'etoi mulina 'abwa yatoholohila.” Ma 'ina he'ita bewa weyahina geya sisanapu, ma hesi geya 'oina sihesilala, weyahina simatauta.
Eeta 'asa Kapaneumi 'oina sihapwesa ma hadai siluhuwa, ma nobwa Yesu 'ana tomuliyao 'ihesilalediya 'igwae, “To ginaula weyahina wahehe'ohe'ohe 'edai?”
Ma sideba mwadina, 'oinega geya sihemaisa, weyahina 'idi he'ohe'ohe lamuna beno taiya 'oidiyega 'idi tohanugeta.

Coinega Yesu 'imiyatoiya ma site tuwelo 'ibwauwediya ma 'ihe'ita 'oidiya, 'igwaeya, “Ceguma taiya 'owa nuwanuwau ma 'oimiyega 'uhebada, 'ilobwainegowa ma 'uboi 'ugihesuluhego ma 'uhetopaihowa 'iyamwao weyahidi.”
Coinega 'aigeda gwama 'itoeyama ma gamwagamwanidiya 'ihetoholoya ma 'i'atusapwaliya ma 'ihegwaediya,
“Ceguma taiya 'owa gwama bewa gidemusa 'uhelauwe weyahigu, 'owa taugu wete 'uhelauwegau, ma geya 'abehega yaboi 'uhelauwegau ma wete 'agu Tohetune Yehoba ba'idagu 'uhelauwemaiya.”
Ma Yoni 'igwaeya, “Bada, 'aigeda loheya 'a'iteya saniuwega hi'ahi'a 'iulaula latuhedi, 'oinega 'a'etobodeya weyahina loheyaina geya 'ida boda.”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Geya sowana wa'au'ausi, weyahina 'eguma taiya 'eta ginaula waiwaidi taugu saniguwega 'ipaihowadi, geya sowana wete 'eta 'isinasinaligau.
Weyahina 'eguma taiyawedi geya silolo'alehegita, taudi silemelemegita.
Ma wete wanuwatuhu 'abehega 'eguma tani'omi 'iyahala ma taiya 'ihenumegomi weyahina 'omi Keliso 'ina bodao, tauna 'ana maisa bwebwe'ana 'abwa 'iloba.
“Ma hesi 'agu tohemisao gwagwamaedi 'eguma taiya 'itohodi, ma 'oidiyega 'aigeda 'i'abihebe'u, loheyaina bo wahineina 'ilobwaineya ma da'ule madouna tani'ona sisipwa mada'ulena siula suluhe ni'uwa.

Wete 'eguma nimau 'igihebe'ugo 'ilobwaineya ma 'u'upwa yahule. Beno geya 'ana galamo 'eguma manima 'upwa'upwau ma yawasi bwebwe'ana 'uloba. Ma hesi gala hedadena 'oiuwa 'eguma manima luwaluwau ma siula suluhego 'aiwe 'ala'alata hataya 'oina.

“Ma wete 'eguma 'aheu 'igihe be'ugo, 'ilobwaineya ma 'u'upwa yahule. Beno geya 'ana galamo 'eguma ma 'ino lopego ma yawasiu bwebwe'ana 'uloba. Ma hesi gala hedadena 'oiuwa, 'eguma ma'ahe luwaluwau siula suluhego 'aiwe 'ala'alasinaina 'oina. Casaina 'oina 'aiwe 'ala'alasina geya 'ida gibowa.

“Matau wete gidemusa 'eguma 'igihebe'ugo 'ubwaiyahule wete, weyahina geya 'eta 'ana galamo 'eguma mamata 'ai'aigedau ma Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'uloba. Ma hesi gala hedadena 'oiuwa, 'eguma mamata luwaluwau siula suluhego 'aiwe 'ala'alata 'oina.
Casaina 'oina mwahulu 'oidiya yapwayapwa sisopisopila hataya ma wete 'aiweina geya 'ida gibowa.
“Coinega tomota mabwaiyadi 'abwa 'aiwe 'ala'alasina 'i'abi hebwebwe'anedi, gide hola 'e'ahai 'i'abi hebwebwe'aneya.
Hola ginaula bwebwe'ana, ma 'eguma 'ana 'amna 'igumwala geya sawasawahina ma 'i'amna hila. Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma mumugami waboi walotoho, 'ana lotohona gidemusa wahehelau hilegomi.”
Ma Yesu tupwaina 'i'ebesineya ma Yudiya 'ina tupwa 'itauya, ma 'ihabala we'aha Yolidani hali tupwa, eeta boda madouna si'eto'auta hilama 'oina, ma mumuganaina gide wete 'ihe'ita 'oidiya.
Ta Palisiyao sinaoma ma nuwanuwadi Yesuina sitoho, 'oinega sihesilala 'oina, sigwae, “Bada, togidega 'ida loina sa'ila weyahina? Sawasawahina loheya mwanena 'isa'ile?”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Togidega Mosese loina 'i'ebwaya 'esegomiya?”
Ma Palisiyao sigwaeya, “Mosese 'itagwala ma 'eguma loheya nuwanuwana ma 'isa'ila, nugeta pepa 'aigeda 'oina 'ina guipaila 'ihepwaile, ma mwanena 'i'ebwae, ma 'isa'ile.”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Mosese loina beno 'i'ebwaegomiya 'imi deba pa'ala weyahina.
Ma hesi wanuwatuhuyahi Yehoba 'ina hemasalaha hauhauna 'oinega tomota 'eluwa 'ihemasalahediya, loheyana ma mewahinena.
Bewa lamuna 'oinega loheya tamana ta sinana 'i'ebesinedi, ma mwanena ba'idana simiyaluwa,
ma siteluwaedi wahidi 'aigeda tuwa. Mwalo siteluwaedi simiya wasiwasiya, ma bewa tutaina 'oina silo'aigeda.
Yehoba 'ilagu 'aigedediya, 'oinega geya sowana tomota sitoho ma silagulagu wasiyedi.”
Muliyetega Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sihila hadai, ma tomuliyaowedi sihesilala hila sa'ila weyahina.
Eeta Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Ceguma taiya loheya mwanena 'isa'ile ma 'ihaibala, loheya bewa mwanena nugenugetaina 'oina galana 'ipaihoweya, weyahina 'iganawala.
Ma wete 'eguma wahine mwanena 'isa'ile ma 'ihaibala, wahineina 'iganawala.”
Ma tomota gwagwama si'ewedima Yesu 'oina 'abehega 'i'abi tohodi. Ma hesi 'ana tomuliyao gwagwamaedi si'ausidiya.
Ma Yesu 'ana tomuliyao 'i'itediya ma 'iheliyediya, 'igwae, “Sahena gwagwama wa'au'ausidi, ma hesi watagwaledi ma 'oiguwa sinaoma, weyahina gwagwama bewa gide Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'ilobwainediya.
Yahegwaegomi 'eguma taiyewedi taudi geya'abwa gwagwama bewa gide 'idi hemisa, nata sahena Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina siluhuluhu.”
Coinega Yesu gwagwamaedi 'i'ahalidiya, ma wete 'i'abi tohodiya, eema 'igwae helauwediya.

Ma Yesu 'itoholo 'itautauya, ma 'aigeda loheya 'ipilima, ma 'i'etuluha Yesu matana, ma 'igwaeya, “Bada, yasanapugowa 'abehega 'owa tohe'ita bwebwe'au, 'oinega to'aha yada paihowa ma 'ane yawasigu miyamiya hatayana yaloba?”
Ma Yesu loheyaina 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Togidega ma 'oinega 'u'ahwa bwebwe'anegauwa? Geya 'eta taiya wete bwebwe'ana, beno tuwa Yehoba.

Ma Yehobaina 'ina loinao 'usanapu pwaidiya, beno 'abehega: Sahena lohe'amasa. Sahena ganawala. Sahena yagaha. Sahena hepwaila 'abo'abo. Sahena 'abowega tomota 'idi tobwatobwa 'u'ewa'ewadi. Ma wete tamau ma sinau 'uhe'asisiyanedi.”
Ma loheyaina 'igwaeya, “Bada, 'igu tuta sedasedega 'ana siga nige, loinaedi yamuliya bwaibwainidiya.”

Coinega Yesu ma'ina yaliyaya loheyaina 'i'ebubuya ma 'igwae, “Beno tuwa 'aigeda ginaula 'ilosapuligowa. Coinega 'uhila 'ino 'asa, ma 'ino tobwatobwa mabwaiyana 'uhegimwaneye, ma 'adi maisa 'uheguyaiye towewelohe 'oidiya, eema 'unaoma 'umuliyegau, 'abwa muliyetega 'ino wasawasa galewa 'uloba hila.”
Gwae bewa loheyaina 'ihesagoheya, ma 'ina wasawasa madouna weyahina nuwana 'igala moisa, ma ma'ina nuwagala 'ihila, ta Yesu 'ina gwaeina geya 'imuliye.
Coinega Yesu 'ilo'ita dadana ma 'ana tomuliyao 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Ceguma taiyawedi taudi ma'idi wasawasa madouna, 'idi luhu Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'alona mwauna.”
Ma 'ana tomuliyao nuwadi 'ihepwanopwanowa 'ina gwaeina weyahina. Coinega Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Natugwao, Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'ana luhu mwau hedada.
Ee moisa, kameli tauna hebahebai madouna, 'oinega tupwana mwauna ma nidili 'ana bwalena 'oinega kameliina 'iluhu, ma hesi towasawasao 'idi luhu Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina mwau hedada.”
Yesu 'ina gwaeina 'ana tomuliyao sihesagoheya ma nuwadi 'ihepwanopwano hedada, ma sihegwaeya, “Ceguma beno gide, taiya hede sawasawahina ma 'ebe yaliyayaina 'iloba?”
Coinega Yesu 'i'e'ebubudi ma 'igwaeya, “Ginaula bewa mwau hedada tomota 'oidiya, ma hesi geya mwauna Yehoba 'oina, weyahina Yehoba 'oina ginaula mabwaiyana sowasowana.”
Ta Pita Yesu 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Bada, tauma togidega? Weyahina 'ima tobwatobwao mabwaiyadi 'a'ebesinediya ma 'amuliyegowa.”

Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Ee moisa, 'eguma taiyawedi 'omi 'imi hadao ta tasimiyao ta nuhumiyao ta sinamiyao ta tamamiyao ta natumiyao ta 'imi bale'u wete wa'ebesinediya, ma wete muya waloba weyahigu ta wasa bwebwe'ana 'ana hepwaila weyahina, 'ami maisa tuta bewa waloba gide handeledi hadao ta tasimiyao ta nuhumiyao ta sinamiyao ta natumiyao ta 'imi bale'u wete, ma 'abwa galewa yawasimi hataya wete waloba.
Ta bewa tutaina tohanugetao baibaiwadi 'abwa simuliya, ma taudi simulimuliya 'abwa sinugeta.”

Cabwa 'edai sihanehane Yelusalema weyahina, ma Yesu 'inugenugeta ma 'ana tomuliyao simulimuliya, ta ma'idi nuwapwanopwano, ma tupwadi tomota wete ma'idi 'ateyoho 'edai simulimuliyedi. Eeta 'ana tomuliyao site tuwelowedi 'ibwau 'autehiledima ma 'ihemataluwediya to'aha 'i'iunamo ma 'ilatu 'oina,

'igwaeya, “Bewa tuta tahane Yelusalema, ma nobwa 'agu totebaina taugu Loheyaiguina 'itebaegau topwaoli madoudi ta loina 'ana tohe'itao 'oidiya, ma 'igu 'amasa weyahina siloina, ma muliyetega sihe'ebwaegau taudi geya meYudiya 'oidiya,
ma taudi meganamuli silotuyanegau ta si'esohegau ta gulahega sisapigau ma 'oinega silohe'amasigau, ma sabwelo 'etoi yatoholohila.”
Coinega Yemesa ma Yoni, taudi Sebedi natunao, Yesu 'oina sinaowa, sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Bada, 'anaoma sabi 'ahwanoi 'oiuwa.”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “To'aha nuwanuwami ma yapaihowa weyahimi?”
Coinega sigwaeya, “Cabwa 'ino 'ebeloina 'oina nuwanuwama ma deiuwa 'amiyatoi, 'aigeda 'ino 'ebeulega ma 'aigeda 'ino 'adigeyegeyega.”

Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Comi 'imi 'ahwanoiina lamuna geya wasanapu. Togidega? Muya 'ana biyoina yanuma, sawasawahina ma 'omi wete 'oinega wanuma? Ma wete babitaiso mwauna 'abwa yaloba, togidega 'omi wete gide sawasawahimi ma wababitaiso 'esa?”
Ta sigwaeya, “Sawasawahima.” Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Moisa, biyoina 'abwa 'oinega yanuma, 'omi wete 'oinega wanuma, wete babaitaisoina 'oinega 'i'iunamo 'abwa yababitaiso 'omi wete 'oinega wababitaiso,
ma hesi geya sawasawahigu ma yahesinuwa taiyewedi 'abwa 'igu hetoloina 'oina 'igu 'ebeulega ma 'igu 'adigeyegeyega simiyatoi, weyahina Yehoba tauna 'ina 'ebeloina ma 'ihesinuwa.”
Ta tomuliyao site teni Yemesa ma Yoni 'idi 'ahwanoi sihesagoheya ma sigamwasowalediya.
Eeta Yesu mabwaiyadi 'ibwau he'autediya ma 'ihegwaediya, “Comi wasanapuya taudi bale'uwa sibwauwediya 'abehega babadao, 'idi tomotaiyao siloiloina pa'aledi.
Ma 'omi geya'abwa wete gide taudi wapaipaihowa 'esa. Ma hesi taiya 'owa 'eguma nuwanuwau ma 'oimiyega 'uhetoloina, 'ilobwainegowa ma 'iyamwao weyahidi 'uhetopaihowa.
Ta wete 'eguma taiya 'owa nuwanuwau ma 'oimiyega 'uhetohanugeta, 'ilobwainegowa ma 'iyamwao mabwaiyadi weyahidi 'uhetopaihowa.

“Taugu Loheyaiguina wete gide 'igu suluma bale'uwa geya 'abehega tomota weyahigu sipaihowa, ma hesi sabi paihowa tomota weyahidi, ma wete yatagwalegauwa ma ya'amasa tomota mabwaiyami 'ami 'ebelihasa weyahina.”

Eeta sitautauya Yeliko, ma tutaina Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao Yeliko si'ebesineya boda madouna si'wayabudiya, ta tomata gibugibu sanina Batimiyo silobeya, tauna Timiyo natuna, ma tuta baibaiwana 'eda papalina 'oina 'imiyamiya, 'i'ahwa'ahwanoi mane ta tobwatobwa weyahidi.
Ma Batimiyoina 'ihesagoheya 'abehega Yesu gwama Nasaleta 'itautau, 'oinega Yesu 'oina 'ibwauwa, 'igwae, “Yesu yo, 'owa Debida 'ina susu, 'u'atemuyemuyegau.”
Eeta tomota mabwaiyadi Batimiyoina si'ausiya, sigwae, “Tuwa, 'ulolagu!” Ma tuwa 'iwuiwui 'enana madounega, 'igwae, “Debida tubuna yo, 'u'atemuyemuyegau.”
Coinega Yesu 'itoholo henonowa, ma 'igwae, “Wabwauweyama.” Ma tomota sigwae, “Bwebwe'ana, 'utoholo. Yesu 'ibwauwegowa.”
Coinega 'ana 'abobo 'i'ewayahuleya ma 'itoholo mwayamwayauwa, ma Yesu 'oina 'inaoma.
Cinaoma ma Yesu 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “To'aha nuwanuwau ma weyahiu yapaihowa?” Ma tomata gibugibuina 'igwaeya, “Bada, sawasawahina ma matagu 'ugihe'asilala?”
Ta Yesu 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Bwebwe'ana! Cino hemisa 'oinega matau 'i'asilala.” Nage 'oina matana 'i'asilala, ma 'edai Yesu 'imuliyeya.

Eeta silagalaga Yelusalema weyahina, ma 'asa 'i'iudi Bedani ma Bedipegi deidiya silatulatu, beno 'oya Olibe gabulena, ma Yelusalema matadiya tupwana bwaga. Ta Yesu 'ana tomuliyao 'eluwa 'ihetune nugetediya tupwaedi 'i'iudi 'oidiya ma'adi hemataluwa,

'igwaeya, “Watauya 'asa nage matamiya 'oina, ma 'eguma wahapwesa 'asaina matana, hebahebai 'aigeda wa'italoba 'aiwe 'oina silohoya, beno 'ase hauhauna, tauna geya tomota sida geluya. Hebahebaiina walihasi ma wa'eweyama.
Ma 'eguma 'eta taiya 'ihesilala 'oimiya ma 'igwae, ‘To'aha weyahina beno hebahebaiina walihasiya?’ loheyaina wahegwae, 'abehega, ‘Bada nuwanuwana ma tuta 'i'iunamo 'abwa 'ihewasa hileyama.’”
Coinega site luwaedi sitauya 'asaina 'oina, ma hebahebai 'ase silobeya hada mata 'ahwaina ma 'aiwe 'oina silohoya, 'oinega sihegaina ma silihalihasi.
Silihalihasi ma tupwadi loheloheya sitotoholo deidiya sigwaeya, “To'aha weyahina beno hebahebaiina walihalihasi?”
Ma site luwaedi sigwaeya, “Bada nuwanuwana, ma tuta to'uto'upana tuwa 'abwa 'ihetune hileyama,” ma 'oidiya sitagwaleya.
Ma hebahebaiina si'eweya sitauyeya Yesu 'oina, ta 'adi 'ale'owega gwahuna siyesoya, 'oinega Yesu 'igeluwa, ta 'itauya.
Ma boda mabwaiyadi wete 'adi 'ale'o 'edai siyesodiya, ma tupwadi 'aiwe lahalahadi ma nabaidi sigulediya 'eda 'ana hepasa weyahina.
Ma tupwana boda Yesu sihanugeteya ma tupwadi boda simuliyeya, ta mabwaiyadi sihehepwatu ma sibwaubwau, sigwae, “Yauwedo Bada, weyahina Yehoba saninega 'unaoma sabi 'abihetemai.
Cebeloina tubumai Debida 'oinega 'ilatu hilama. Bewa weyahina Yehoba Tolotabwana hedada 'ahehepwatuwe.”

Ma Yesuina Yelusalema 'oina 'ihapwesa, ma Hada He'asisi 'oina 'iluhuwa, ma ginaula baibaiwana Hada He'asisi 'alona 'i'e'ebubudiya, eema sinala 'isopuwa, 'oinega ma'ana tomuliyao site tuwelo mahetenao sihila Bedani 'oina, si'enowa.
Gona 'i'adaleya, sitoholowa ma Bedani 'oinega sihilahila Yelusalema weyahina, ta Yesu 'igomaleya,
eeta bwagebwagega 'aiwe 'ana 'ita gide damaya manabanabaina 'i'iteya, 'oinega 'inaowa deina ma nuwanuwana 'abehega huwaina 'i'ai, ma hesi 'i'iteya nabainamo, 'aiwehuwahuwa 'abwa geya 'ana tuta.
Coinega Yesu 'aiweina 'iheliyeya, ma 'igwae, “Geya'abwa wete 'uhuwahuwa hila ma tomota 'oinega si'ai'ai.” Ma 'ina gwaeina 'ana tomuliyao sihesagoheya.

Coinega Yelusalema 'oina sinaoma, ma Hada He'asisi 'alona 'iluhuwa, ma tohegimwaneyao ma togimwaneyao 'alonega 'ipa'i hapwesediya, ma mane 'ana tohesa'ugelasao 'idi teibele 'i'ahu sepalediya, ma gabubu 'adi tohegimwaneyao 'idi 'ebemiya wete 'i'ahu buinediya.
Ma wete hada 'alona 'ihegagaleya ma sahena loheloheya ma'idi tobwatobwa sitautau hada 'alonega.

Ma 'ihe'itediya, 'igwae, “Yehoba 'ina gwae Buki He'asisi 'oina sileleya, geya wasanapu, 'igwaeya, ‘Cigu hadaina 'abwa sibwauwe tomota mabwaiyadi 'idi 'ebe 'ahwanoi.’ Ma hesi 'omi wa'abi buiya 'abehega 'imi 'ebe yagaha.”

Ma topwaoli madoudi ma loina 'ana tohe'itao Yesu 'ina paihowa tetelina sihesagoheya, ta sigamwasowaleya ma sinuwanuwatuhu togidega ma silohe'amasi, ma hesi geya sowasowahidi, weyahina simatauta, ta wete Yesu 'ina he'itao boda mabwaiyadi nuwadi 'i'eweya.
Ma 'iboiya, 'oinega Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao 'asaina si'ebesineya, sitauya Bedani.
Gona 'i'adaleya ma sitoholowa sabi hila Yelusalema, ma 'edai sitautau, ma Yesu 'aiweina 'iheliyeya si'iteya nabaina mabwaiyana siwelaiya.
Ta Pita Yesu 'ina heliyaina 'inuwatuhu yahiya ma 'ihegwaeya, 'igwae, “Bada 'u'ita, 'aiweina 'uheliyeya 'iwelai pwaiya.”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Ceguma 'imi hemisa Yehoba 'oina walagu, beno 'omi wete paihowa waiwaidi wapaihowadi.

Wete yagwae moisa 'oimiya, 'eguma taiya 'omi geya 'ida henuwanaluwa, ma 'eguma ma'ina hemisa ma to'aha 'igwaene silatu tuwa, 'eguma 'oya nage 'iloine ma 'igwae, ‘Cumiya dobi ni'uwa,’ beno 'ina gwaeina 'ihematamatane.
Coinega yahegwaegomi to'aha wa'ahwanoiye Yehoba 'oina, wahemisa tuwa ma 'ane waloba, ma wete 'abwa waloba.
Wete 'eguma wa'ahwanoi Yehoba 'oina, 'iyamiyao 'idi mumuga wanuwasamudi, 'eguma to'aha 'idi puiyao 'oimiya, bewa 'oinega Tamamiu galewa 'omi wete 'imi puiyao 'inuwasamudi.”
Coinega sihila pwaima Yelusalema, ma Yesu Hada He'asisi 'alona 'iyawayawala, ma topwaoli ta loina 'ana tohe'itao ta wete babadao sinaoma,
ma Yesu sihesilaleya, sigwae, “Loheya, taiya 'ina loinega ta bewa gide 'upaipaihowa 'esa?”
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Nugeta yahesilala 'oimiya, ma 'eguma wahemaise, taugu wete yahegwaegomi 'igu loina weyahina.
Cigu hesilala bewa: Taiya 'ina loinega ma Yoni to'abihebabitaiso 'ipaipaihowa? Yehoba? Bo 'aigeda loheya?”

Coinega siboidimo 'oidiya sihehe'ohe'ohe, sigwaeya, “Cina gwae togidega tahemaisa 'ese? Weyahina 'eguma tagwae, ‘Yehoba 'oinega,’ nata 'ihegwae hilegita, ma 'igwae, ‘Bo! To'aha weyahina ta Yoni geya wahemisae?’
Ma 'eguma tagwae, ‘Tomota 'oidiyega,’ nata boda sigamwasowalegita.” Weyahina tomota baibaiwadi Yoni sihemisaeya 'abehega palopita moisa.

Coinega Yesu 'ina hesilala geya sihemaisa bwaibwaini, ma hesi sigwae, “Geya 'asanapu?” Coinega Yesu wete 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Taugu geya'abwa wete 'oimiya yahehepwaila latu taiya 'ina loinega ma bewa gidemusa yapaipaihowa 'esa.”

Coinega Yesu 'igwae hegehegediyediya, 'igwae, “Caigeda loheya 'ina tanoha 'idauniya gileipa daisinamo ma 'ali 'ipaihoweya, ma gileipa 'ana 'ebe bibi 'ipaihoweya, ma hada tanoha 'alona 'i'abiya, 'oinega 'ina topaihowao 'iloinediya ma si'ita'itayahi, ta tauna 'itauya hali tupwa.
“Ma hedodona 'ana tuta, badaina 'ina hewali 'aigeda 'ihesumaneya ma 'abehega gileipa huwaina tanoha 'ana to'itayahinaedi 'oidiyega 'i'eweyama.
Citautauya ta geya si'ebwa'ebwae, ma hesi si'abiyahiya ta sisapiya, 'oinega nimenimenamo sihewasaeya 'ihila.
“Coinega badaina 'ina hewali heluwena wete 'ihewasaeya 'oidiya, ma sihunuya debana, ta ma'ina debamwadina 'ihila.
“Coinega wete hetoina 'ihewasaeya 'oidiya ta silohe'amasiya. Ma baibaiwadi wete 'ihetunediya 'oidiya, ma tupwadi sisapidiya ta tupwadi silohe 'amasidiya, eeta mabwaiyadi si'abihe galediya.
“Nage 'oina 'aigeda tuwamo 'imiyamiya, tauna natuna moisa. Tauna wete 'ihewasaeya 'oidiya, 'ina nuwatuhu 'igwaeya, ‘Tauna tuwa natugu, nata sihe'asisiyane.’
“Ma natunaina 'ilatuwa 'oidiya ma to'itayahinaowedi siboidimo 'oidiya sigwae, ‘Bada bewa natuna 'inaonaoma, ma 'eguma talohe'amasi nata tanoha bewa mabwaiyana taloinae.’
Coinega si'abiyahiya ta silohe'amasiya, ma tanohega siula latuheya papaliya.”

Yesu 'ina he'ote'otetela 'ilosalohiya, ma 'ihesilala 'oidiya, 'igwaeya, “To'aha 'abwa badaina 'ipaihowa? Moisa tuwa badaina 'abwa 'inaoma ma topaihowaedi 'ilohe'amasidi, ma tanohaina to'itayahi hagadi wete 'i'ebwaedi.”

Wete Yesu gwae hegehegedi Buki He'asisi 'oinega 'ihepwaileya, 'igwae, “Wanuwatuhuya Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila bewa gide: Logidiina mwalo tohada'abi siguipaileya, ta bewa sihetoholo nugeteya hada mata 'ahwaina ma logidi mabwaiyadi 'iloinaedi.
Beno Bada 'ina paihowa 'ebe henainaida 'oida.”

Yesu 'ina gwae hegehegediyedi topwaoli madoudi ma Palisiyao sihesagoheya, ma sisanapuya 'abehega taudi tuwa weyahidi 'igwaegwae, 'oinega sitohotoho ma si'abiyahi, ma hesi geya sawasawahina weyahina simatauta boda 'oidiya. Eeta si'ebesineya ma sitauya.
Ma 'oinega babadaowedi sihetunediya tupwadi Palisiyao ma wete Helodi 'ina bodao, ma taudi sitauya Yesu 'oina ma 'abehega hesilalega sida 'abowe ma 'ina hemaisa pui siloba.

Sitauyama Yesu 'oina ma sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Bada, 'asanapugowa 'abehega 'owa tohe'ita moisa, ma tomota 'idi waiwai weyahina geya 'uda matauta, ma tuwa gwae moisega 'uhehepwaila mahemahetena tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya, beno Yehoba 'ina 'eda 'uhehe'ita bwaibwaini. Coinega togidega? Cilobwainegita ma Kini Sisa 'ina takesi ta'ebwae, bo sahena?
Sowasowana takesiina tahemaisa Kini 'oina, bo sahena?” Ma Yesu 'idi 'abo 'isanapu pwaiya, 'oinega 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “To'aha weyahina watohotohogau? Hana maneina wa'eweyama, ma ya'ita.”
Coinega mane da'ule 'aigeda si'ebwaeya. Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Mane bewa 'oina taiya 'ana ma'ama'ayau ma sanina?” Ma sigwae “Kini Sisa.”
Ta Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Ee gide, 'eguma Kini 'ina ginaula wa'ebwae Kini 'oina, ma 'eguma Yehoba 'ina ginaula Yehoba wa'ebwae.” Ma Yesu 'ina gwaeina weyahina nuwadi 'ihepwanopwano madouna.
Coinega wete Sadusiyao sinaoma ma Yesu 'oina sihesilala, taudi geya sihemihemisa to'amasa 'idi toholohila weyahina, ma sigwaeya,

“Bada, 'ida loina bewa gide Mosese 'ileleya, 'igwae, ‘Ceguma 'aigeda loheya 'ihai ma geya natunamo ma 'i'amasa, loheyaina tasina hiwapena ba'idana sihai, ma 'eguma wahine 'igamwa beno natunao 'ihenatunediya to'amasaina miyalaenao’”

Coinega 'ebe'ita si'ebwaeya sigwae, “Caigeda loheya matasinao simiyamiya 'adi baibaiwa site sebeni, ma 'adi tautuwaina 'ihaiya ma muliyetega geya 'ihenatuna ma loheyaina 'i'amasa. Coinega wete tasina deinega hiwapeina 'ihaiya, ta wete gidemusa geya 'ihenatuna ma 'i'amasa.
Coinega tasina deinega hiwapeina 'i'eweya, ma wete simiyamiya ta geya 'ihenatuna, ma loheyaina 'i'amasa.
Ma site hataedi wete gidemusa si'ama'amasa ma hesi geya natudiyaomo. Ta muliyetega wahine wete 'i'amasa.
Coinega toholohila 'ana tuta wahineina nata to loheya mwanena moisa? Weyahina mabwaiyadiyedi wahineina sihaiya?”
Ma Yesu 'idi hesilalaina 'ihemaiseya, 'igwae, “Bewa 'imi heyauyaule, weyahina Buki He'asisi geya wada sanapuya, ma wete Yehoba 'ina waiwai geya wada sanapuya.
Toholohila 'ana tuta 'oina tomota geya'abwa sihaihai, ma hesi 'idi miya aneloseyao galewa gidemusa.

“Mwalona Yehoba Mosese 'ihegwaeya toholohila weyahina, 'eguma Buki He'asisi wahasili, nata wa'ita loba. Weyahina tutaina Mosese yoho 'awawa 'itautauya ma Yehoba 'aiwe 'ala'alasina 'oinega Moseseina 'ihegwaeya 'igwae, ‘Taugu Ebalahamo 'ina Yehoba, ma Aisake 'ina Yehoba, ma Yakobo 'ina Yehoba.’
Yehoba geya tomota 'ama'amasidi 'idi Yehoba, ma hesi tomota mayawasidi 'idi Yehoba, 'oinega tubudaowedi mayawasidi bewa tuwa simiyamiya. Ma 'omi 'imi he'ita ginaula bewa weyahina geya dumwaluna.”

Eeta loina 'ana tohe'ita 'aigeda 'inaoma, ma taudi 'idi he'ohe'ohena Yesu ba'idadiu 'ihesagoheya, ma 'idi hesilalao 'adi maisa Yesu 'oinega 'ihesagohediya wete 'abehega 'ausala hedada, 'oinega tauna wete Yesu 'oina 'ihesilala 'igwaeya, “Bada, loina mabwaiyadi 'oidiyega to loina madouna?”
Ta Yesu 'igwaeya, “Loina madouna bewa: Comi meIsileli 'igu gwaeina wahesagohe 'abehega Bada Yehoba 'iboinamo.
Coinega 'ino Bada Yehoba 'uhelauwe 'ateu mabwaiyanega ta yaluyaluwau ta nuwau ta wete 'ino waiwai mabwaiyana 'oidiyega.
Ma 'aigeda wete loina madouna bewa: Ciyamwao 'uhelauwedi gide 'owa 'uboi 'uhehelauwego. Loina 'eluwaedi loina mabwaiyadi simadou sinediya.”
Eeta loina 'ana tohe'itaina Yesu 'ina gwae 'ihesagoheya, ma 'igwaeya, “Bada, 'ino gwae beno gwae moisa, 'abehega tauna 'iboinamo tuwa Yehoba, ma geya 'aigeda wete Yehoba 'imiyamiya.

Coinega 'ilobwainegita ma tahelauwe 'ateda mabwaiyanega ta nuwada mabwaiyanega ta 'ida waiwai mabwaiyanega, ma wete 'iyadao tahelauwedi gidemusa tauda tahehelau 'esegita. Loina 'eluwaedi madoudi, ma hesi hebai nuwana 'e'ahai tapwaoliye Yehoba 'oina, beno geya madouna, 'awa?”

Ta Yesu loheyaina 'ina gwae 'ihesagoheya 'abehega dumwaluna, ma 'ihegwaeya 'igwae, “Beno gwae moisa, ma 'owa Yehoba 'ina 'ebeloina 'oina 'uhahalatulatu.” Tuta nage 'oina tomota Yesu simatauteya, ma geya 'eta taiya sowasowana ma 'ihesilala hila.
Ma 'oinega Yesu Hada He'asisi 'alona 'ihehe'ita tomota 'oidiya, ma 'ihegwaediya 'igwae, “Togidega ma 'oinega loina 'ana tohe'itao sigwae 'abehega Debida 'ina susuwega Keliso 'ili'uwa?

Weyahina Debida mwalo Yaluyaluwa Tabuna 'ina waiwai 'oinega Kelisoina 'i'ahwa badaeya, 'igwae: Yehoba 'ina gwae 'igu Bada 'oina, 'igwaeya, ‘Cigu 'ebeulega 'umiyatoi ma 'ana siga 'a 'alehao yalagu suluhedi 'aheu gabulena.’
Debidaina 'ina Bada Keliso, 'oinega togidega hede ta Debida 'ina susuwega 'abwa Keliso 'ili'uma?” Ma boda mabwaiyadi Yesu 'ina he'ita nuwadi 'i'eweya.

Coinega Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Sahena loina 'ana tohe'itao mumugadi wamulimuliye. Weyahina taudi mumugadi tuwa gidemusa tuta baibaiwana nuwanuwadi ma'adi 'ale'o duduledi si'otedi, ma tomota gamwagamwanidiya sisakosakowasi ma 'abehega sihe'asisiyedi.
Ma wete nuwanuwadi 'ebemiya bwebwe'ana hada tapwalolo 'oidiya, ma wete guyai 'adi tuta nuwanuwadi ma wagahata simiyatoi.

Ta wete tuta mabwaiyana tomota matadiya si'ahwa'ahwanoi dudulena Yehoba 'oina, ma hesi 'idi 'ahwanoiina geya bwebwe'ana, weyahina 'atediya sinuwanuwatuhu togidega nata hiwahiwape si'abo 'esedi ma 'idi tobwatobwao si'ewadi. Coinega nata Yehoba maisa galana 'i'ebwaedi.”
Yesu Hada He'asisi 'oina helau 'ana 'ebe lagu deina 'imiyatoiya, ma tomota 'idi helau mane silagulagu ma Yesu 'i'e'ebubuna, ma towasawasao 'idi helau madoudi 'i'itediya,
ma wete hiwape wewelohena 'i'iteya 'ina helau toea 'eluwamo 'ilagudiya.
Yesu 'i'iteya ma 'ana tomuliyao 'ibwau he'autedima, ma 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Moisa tuwa, hiwape nage 'ina helau mabwaiyadi 'idi helau 'imadou sinediya.
Weyahina mabwaiyadi 'idi tupwa madouna 'imiyamiya, ma hesi hiwape nage weweloheina, ma 'ina mane mabwaiyana 'ilaguya, ta geya 'eta wete 'ina tupwa 'imiyamiya ma 'oinega 'ana 'igimwane.”

Eeta Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao Hada He'asisi 'oinega silatuwa, ma 'ana tomuliya 'aigeda Hada He'asisi 'ana hadao Yesu 'ihe'itaeya, 'igwae, “Bada, 'u'ita hadaedi 'adi paihowa bwebwe'ana hedada, da'ule madoudi 'oidiyega si'abidiya.”
Ma Yesu 'igwae, “Hadaedi madoudi 'u'itediya 'i'iunamo ma mabwaiyadi siligeha yahuledi ma geya'abwa wete 'eta tupwa wa'ita'ita hila.”

Muliyetega Yesu 'itauya Olibe 'oyana 'oina ta 'imiyatoiya, ma 'oinega Hada He'asisi Yelusalema 'oina 'i'e'ebubuna, ma Pita ta Yemesa ta Yoni ta Andulu sinaoma ma siboidimo Yesu ba'idadiu, eema sihegwaeya, sigwae,
“Bada 'uhegwaemai to tuta 'oina Hada He'asisi siligehi, ma to 'ila'ilala 'adi 'ita 'oidiyega 'ada sanapu 'abehega ginauledi 'i'iunamo silatuma?”
Coinega Yesu 'ihe'ale 'oidiya 'ihepwaila ma 'igwaeya, “Wa'ita yahigomi tabu ma tomota tupwadi si'abowegomi.
Weyahina 'abwa tomota baibaiwadi saniguwega sinaonaoma ma 'abehega sihanugeta puigomi, ma 'aigeda 'aigeda 'oidiyega sigwae, ‘Taugu Kelisoina,’ ma tomota baibaiwadi simuliyedi.

Wete wasa 'abwa wahesagohedi 'alehao deimiya, ma wete bwaga, taudimo si'ale'aleha hiladi, ma hesi sahena wa'ate'ateyoho. Ginaula bewa nata silatu nugeta ma hesi bale'u 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'ana tuta 'abwa hedada.

Weyahina 'abwa hali boda ma hali boda si'aleha hiladi, ma wete hali 'ebeloina ma hali 'ebeloina silo'aleha hiladi, ma wete mwani'ini'i sipilipili hali tupwa ma hali tupwa 'oidiya, ma gomale madoudi sihapwehapwesa. Ma ginaulaedi bewa tuta mwauna 'ana 'ebehegaina tuwa.

“Ta 'omi hesi wa'itayahigomi, weyahina tomota 'abwa si'abiyahigomi ma sitauyegomi yatala weyahina, ta Hada Tapwalolo 'oidiya sisapigomi, ta wete 'abwa toloinao ma kiniyao matadiya sitoegomi ma watoholo ma siheyatalaegomi, beno weyahina 'omi 'abehega taugu 'igu bodao, ta saugaina 'oina teteligu wahepwaile 'oidiya.
Ma teteligu bwebwe'ana 'i'elelewana nugeta tupwa mabwaiyana 'oidiya, ma muliyetega tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'ihapwesa.

“Ma 'eguma toloinao matadiya sihetohologomi yatala weyahina, sahena wa'ate'ateyoho togidega wagwae 'esa. Ma hesi ma'imi 'atepatu tuwa wagwae, weyahina geya 'abehega 'omi 'imi gwae wahehepwaile, ma hesi Yaluyaluwa Tabuna nata gwae 'i'ebwaegomi, ma wahepwaila latuhe.

“Ta wete tuta sinaonaoma 'oidiya tomota 'idi susu 'alodiya 'aleha 'ihapwesa weyahigu, beno loheya tasina 'itebae ma silohe'amasi. Ma wete gide tamana natuna 'itebae ma silohe'amasi. Ma wete gwagwama sinadiyao ta tamadiyao sitebaedi ma silohe'amasidi.
Ta tomota mabwaiyadi 'abwa silo'alehegomi weyahina 'omi 'abehega 'agu tohemisao. Ma hesi taiyawedi 'omi weyahigu wa'atepatu ee 'ana siga tuta 'ana 'ebelosaloha 'oina, nata 'ebe yaliyaya waloba.

“Cabwa 'eguma 'omi wa'itadi hali tomota ginaula gala hedadedi ma didigadi sihetoholodi tupwa he'ahe'asisina 'oina (Ceguma taiya nage gwaeina 'ihasili 'abwa 'isanapu), tuta nage 'oina Yudiya 'ana tomiyao 'ilobwainediya ma 'oya 'oidiya sidena.
Ma 'eguma taiya wagahata 'imiyamiya 'idena mwayamwayau, ma sahena 'iluhuluhu hila 'ina hada 'alona 'ina tobwatobwa sabi 'ewadi.
Ma 'eguma taiya wete tanoha 'ipaipaihowa geya'abwa wete 'ihilahila 'ana 'ale'o hali tupwa 'ilaguya 'i'ewa.
“Ma tuta nage 'oina togamwa ma tohesusuwao sihenuwa'ole'ole.
Coinega wa'ahwanoi waiwai ma tuta bwebwe'ana Yehoba 'i'ebwaegomi 'imi tuta dena 'oina, ma sahena gogai 'ana tuta.

“Moisa tuwa, tuta nage 'oina mwau hedada, weyahina tutaina Yehoba bale'u 'ihemasaleheya 'oinega ma 'ana siga nige geya 'aigeda wete mwau nage gide 'ida latuwa, ma 'abwa geya sowana wete mwau bewa gide 'ida latu hila.

Mwau nina 'ana sabwelowao 'eguma Yehoba sahena 'i'abi'abi hetoto'upe beno tomota mabwaiyadi si'amasa, ma hesi Yehoba sabwelowedi 'abwa 'i'abi hetoto'upadi, tauna 'ina tomotaiyao hesihesinuwaidi weyahidi.
“Tutaina 'oina 'eguma taiya 'ihegwaegomi, 'igwae, ‘Keliso bewa’ nuwana ‘Nage,’ sahena wahehemisaedi.
Weyahina Keliso 'abo'abodi ma palopita 'abo'abodi beno silatulatuma ma 'ila'ilala waiwaidi tomota 'oidiya sihe'itaedi, ma 'oidiyega 'eguma sawasawahidi Yehoba 'ina bodao hesihesinuwaidi si'abowedi.
Coinega wa'ita yahigomi, weyahina ginaulaedi bewa yahepwaila pwaiya 'oimiya.
“Ma tuta mwauwedi 'igumwala ma muliyetega sinala 'iguguyou, ma wete wai'ena 'ina maedana 'igibo,
ma 'ipwala galewa sigubagubala, ma ginaulao galewa mabwaiyadi simiyamiya 'idi waiwai si'elo we'a.
Tuta nage 'oina mebale'u taugu Loheyaiguina si'itegau yaloha 'oidiyega yasulusuluma ma'igu waiwai ta ma'igu wasawasa madouna,
'oinega 'igu aneloseyao yahetunedi, 'igu bodao hesihesinuwaidi sihegogonedima bale'u ta galewa ta yaumai mabwaiyadi 'idi tupwa 'oidiyega.
“Cebe'ita saido 'oinega yahe'itegomi 'abehega 'eguma saido nabaina hauhaudi 'ilagulagudi, beno wasanapuya 'esihe 'ana tuta 'abwa 'ilatu.
Ma wete 'ila'ilalaowedi 'oimiya yahepwailediya, 'eguma to tuta ma wa'ita lobadi, beno wasanapuya 'abehega 'igu tuta hilama 'ana tuta 'i'ehohoya.
Moisa tuwa, yaso bewa geya sowana wagumwagumwala ma 'ana siga ginaulaedi mabwaiyadi silatu.
“Cabwa galewa ma bale'u sisawala, ma hesi 'igu gwae geya sowana 'isawasawala.
“Ma hesi geya 'eta taiya 'isanapu to tuta nuwana to sabwelo 'oina yahilama, ta wete aneloseyao galewa geya sisanapu. Ma taugu wete geya yasanapu. Ta Tamagu 'iboinamo 'isanapuya.
Coinega walomatayahi, weyahina 'igu tuta hilama geya wasanapu.”

Cebe'ita wete Yesu 'i'ebwaediya 'igwae, “Ceguma 'aigeda bada 'abehega 'ina hada 'abwa 'ipilisine ma 'itautau hali tupwa, 'ina topaihowa 'aigeda 'aigeda 'idi paihowa 'iheguyaidi, ma 'iloinedi ma 'abehega 'ina hada si'itayahi, ma wete hada 'ana 'ahwa'eda 'ana to'itayahina 'ihegwae, 'igwae, ‘Geya'abwa 'u'eno'eno, ma hesi 'ulomatayahi bwaibwaini.’

Coinega 'ilobwainegomiya ma walomatayahi ma wayamweyamwegau, weyahina toni hadaina 'ina latu 'ana tuta geya wasanapu, nuwana lahilahiya, nuwana nihuwana gamwana, nuwana gona 'ada'adale, nuwana gonagona.
Geya'abwa yalatulatuma ma 'eno'enowega 'atemi yaloheyoho.
“Cigu hemataluwa bewa 'oimiya ma wete tomota mabwaiyadi 'oidiya 'abehega walomatayahi bwaibwaini.”

Hataona Guyaina 'ana 'ebe nuwatuhuyahina 'abwa 'ilatu sabwelo 'eluwa mulina. Guyaina 'alona 'adi pwalawa geya 'ana 'ebe 'abi hesesehamo si'ai. Ma topwaoli madoudi ta loina 'ana tohe'itao sinuwanuwatuhu togidega ma Yesu si'abo 'ese eema 'abehega si'abiyahi ma silohe'amasi,
ma sigwaeya, “Geya'abwa guyaina 'alona Yesu ta'abi'abiyahi, tabu ma tomota sigamwasowalegita ma silo'alehegita.”

Yesu 'abwa Bedani 'oina 'imiyamiya Saimoni 'ina hada, tauna mwalo lepelo 'aigeda; ma tutaina Yesu 'i'ai'ai Saimoni 'ina hada, wahine 'aigeda ma'ina holowa 'iluhuma; ma holowaina sanina nadi, maisana madouna, ma 'ana botolo 'ausala hedadena. Ma wahine botoloina 'ahwana 'i'ahulaseya, ma holowaina Yesu debana 'isiweya.
Ma tupwadi tomota si'iteya ma wahine silomugiyeya, sigwae, “To'aha weyahina holowa 'imudaliya?
Cilobwaineya ma holowaina 'ihegimwaneye ma 'ana maisa teli handeledi kina gide 'i'ewa ma 'iheguyaiye towewelohe 'oidiya.” Coinega wahineina siheliyeya.
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Tuwa! Walolagu! Geya sowana wahine wa'abi'abi hedohedou, weyahina 'ina lema 'oiguwa bwebwe'ana hedada.
Toweweloheyedi wagwaegwaenedi tuta baibaiwana deimiya simiyamiya, ma 'eguma to tuta nuwanuwami tuwa walemedi, ma taugu hesi geya tuta dudulena ba'idamiu tamiyamiya.
Ma wahine bewa to'aha 'oina madouna 'ipaihoweya 'oiguwa, beno wahigu 'iheholoi nugeteya sabi 'atububuina 'agu lagu galiha weyahina.
Ma moisa tuwa, 'abwa wasagu 'ana guguya tomota sihesagohe bale'u mabwaiyana 'oina, ma wahine bewa 'ina paihowa 'oiguwa wete wasana sihe'ote'otetele.”
Coinega Yesu 'ana tomuliya 'aigeda site tuwelo 'oidiyega, tauna Yudasa Isakaliyota, 'itauya topwaoliyao 'idi babadao 'oidiya ma nuwanuwana Yesu 'oidiya 'itebae.
Yudasa 'ina gwae sihesagoheya, ma siyaliyaya ma 'oina sigwae hemisa 'abehega 'ana maisa si'ebwae. Coinega Yudasa tuta bwebwe'ana 'iloyamweya ma 'abehega Yesu 'oidiya 'itebae ma si'abiyahi.

Guyai 'ana tuta, beledi geya 'ana 'abi hesesehamo si'ai'ai, ma 'ana sabwelo nugenugetaina 'oina lamiyao sihunudi Hataona 'ana 'ebe nuwatuhuyahina weyahina, ma sabweloina 'oina Yesu 'ana tomuliyao sihegwaeya sigwae, “Bada, ta'eha 'oina nuwanuwau ma Hataona Guyaina weyahina 'a'atububu?”

Coinega 'ana tomuliyao 'eluwa 'ihewasediya ma'adi hemataluwa, 'igwaeya, “Watau Yelusalema, ma 'eguma loheya 'aigeda ma'ina 'ebegoi 'i'ahaliya waloba, loheyaina wamuliye ma ba'idamiu waluhu hadai, ma tonihada wahegwae bewa gide, wagwae, ‘Bada bewa gide 'igwae 'esa 'igwaeya, “To tupwa 'eguma 'utagwale ma 'oina ma'agu tomuliyao Hataona 'e'ahaina 'a'ai?” ’
Eema 'ihe'itegomi tupwa madouna tabwana 'atu'atububuina. Tauna 'oina Hataona 'e'ahaina wa'atububu weyahida.”
Coinega tomuliyaowedi sitauya ma 'asa Yelusalema 'oina siluhuwa ma to'aha gide Yesu 'igwaeneya 'oidiya ginauledi mabwaiyadi silobediya, ta hadaina 'oina Hataona 'e'ahaina si'atububuya weyahidi.
Ta lahilahiya Yesu ma'ana tomuliyao sinaoma,

ma site tuwelo simiyatoiya sabi lohepa'ala. Ta 'idi 'ai 'alona Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Ciyagwao yahegwae bwaibwainigomi 'abehega 'aigeda loheya bewa ba'idadai ta'ai'ai, 'abwa tauna nata 'i'iunamo ma 'itebaegau.”
Ma Yesu 'ina gwae bewa weyahina sinuwagala, ta 'aigeda 'aigeda Yesu sihegwaeya, sigwae, “Bada, taiya? Nuwana taugu?”
Ma Yesu 'igwaeya, “Cagu totebaina 'omi wate tuwelowedi 'oimiyega, ta tauna ba'idagu gaeba 'oina 'a'ai.

Taugu Loheyaiguina 'abwa yatauya 'edaina mwalo Buki Tabu 'oina sihepwaila nugeteya, ma hesi 'agu totebaina nuwagalagalaina moisa; ma bwebwe'ana 'eguma mwalo sinana geya'abwa 'ihehenatune, weyahina 'ina li'u 'oinega 'ihenuwa galagala 'ina paihowa galana weyahina.”
Cabwa si'ai'ai, ma Yesu beledi 'i'eweya ma weyahina 'igwae helauwa, ta 'ihisiya ma 'i'ebwaediya, 'igwae, “Bewa wa'ai wahigu.”
Ta waini mabiyoina wete 'i'eweya, ma weyahina 'iloyauwedo Yehoba 'oina, ma 'i'ebwaediya, ma mabwaiyadi sinuma.
Ta wete 'ihegwaediya, 'igwae, “Bewa bweyahigu 'idaudau tomota mabwaiyami weyahimi, beno loina 'ehauna.
Ma yahegwaegomi tuta bewa ma mulina waini bewa geya'abwa 'oinega yanumanuma hila ma 'ana siga waini 'ehauna 'abwa yanuma Yehoba 'ina tupwa.”
Coinega wali 'aigeda siwaliyeya ma sihapwesa sihaneya 'oya Olibe 'oina.
Ma Yesu 'ihegwaediya, “Ci'iunamo ma mabwaiyami wadena sinegau, gide Buki He'asisi 'ina hepwaila 'igwaeya, ‘To'itayahina sipi yalohe'amasi ma sipiyedi si'elelewana.’
Ma 'igu toholohila mulina Galili 'oina yatauya, ma 'omi muliguwega wanaoma.”
Coinega Pita 'igwaeya, “Nata mabwaiyadi sidenasinego, ma taugu tuwa ba'idau tamiyamiya.”
Ta Yesu Pita 'ihegwaeya, “Yagwae moisa 'oiuwa nihuwana nata muliyega 'abwa 'am'am 'idou maluwa, beno 'owa 'uuhalegau matoi.”
